[03] raajaa kumaarassa sariirasakkaara.m katvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa ca mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa cetiyassa puuja.m akaasi, tattha mahaajano sannipati, theropi saparivaaro ta.m padesa.m upaga~nchi. atha devaputto attanaa katakusalakamma.m oloketvaa kata~n~nutaaya ``gantvaa thera.m vandissaami, saasanagu.ne ca paaka.te karissaamii''ti cintetvaa dibbaratha.m aaruyha mahataa parivaarena dissamaanaruupo aagantvaa rathaa oruyha therassa paade vanditvaa ^a^M0.0249^ea^ pitaraa saddhi.m pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa thera.m payirupaasamaano a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. ta.m thero imaahi gaathaahi pucchi --
[21] ``sahassara.msiiva yathaamahappabho, disa.m yathaa bhaati nabhe anukkama.m.
[22] lekhaa suva.n.nassa ca ruupiyassa ca, sobhenti ve.luriyamayaa sunimmitaa..
[22] yuttaa suva.n.nassa ca ruupiyassa ca, sobhanti assaa ca ime manojavaa..
[22] pucchaami taaha.m yasavanta kovida.m, katha.m tayaa laddho aya.m u.laaro''ti..

[03] 1007^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sahassara.msii^eb^ti suuriyo. so hi anekasahassara.msimantataaya ``sahassara.msii''ti vuccati. ^b^yathaamahappabho^eb^ti attano mahattassa anuruupappabho. yathaa hi mahattena suuriyama.n.dalena sadisa.m jotima.n.dala.m natthi, eva.m pabhaayapi. tathaa hi ta.m ekasmi.m kha.ne tiisu mahaadiipesu aaloka.m pharanta.m ti.t.thati. ^b^disa.m yathaa bhaati nabhe anukkama^eb^nti nabhe aakaase yatheva disa.m anukkamanto gacchanto yathaa yena pakaarena bhaati dibbati jotati. ^b^tathaapakaaro^eb^ti taadisaakaaro. ^b^tavaaya^eb^nti tava aya.m.

[03] 1008^b^.^eb^ ^b^suva.n.napa.t.tehii^eb^ti ^a^M0.0250^ea^ suva.n.namayehi pa.t.tehi. ^b^samantamottha.to^eb^ samantato chaadito. ^b^urassaa^eb^ti uro assa, rathassa ^a^P0.0269^ea^ uroti ca iisaamuula.m vadati. ^b^lekhaa^eb^ti ve.luriyamayaa maalaakammalataakammaadilekhaa. taasa.m suva.n.napa.t.tesu ca rajatapa.t.tesu ca dissamaanattaa vutta.m ^b^``suva.n.nassa ca ruupiyassa caa''^eb^ti. ^b^sobhentii^eb^ti ratha.m sobhayanti.

[03] 1009^b^.^eb^ ^b^siisa^eb^nti rathakubbarasiisa.m. ^b^ve.luriyassa nimmita^eb^nti ve.luriyena nimmita.m, ve.luriyama.nimayanti attho. ^b^lohitakaayaa^eb^ti lohitakama.ninaa, yena kenaci rattama.ninaa vaa. ^b^yuttaa^eb^ti yojitaa, atha vaa ^b^yottaa suva.n.nassa ca ruupiyassa caa^eb^ti suva.n.namayaa ca ruupiyamayaa ca yottaa, sa"nkhalikaati attho.

[03] 1010^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhi.t.thito^eb^ti attano deviddhiyaa sakalamida.m .thaana.m abhibhavitvaa .thito. ^b^sahassavaahano^eb^ti sahassayuttavaahano, sahassaaajaaniiyayuttaratho devaanamindo yathaati adhippaayo. ^b^yasavantaa^eb^ti aalapana.m, yasassiiti attho. ^b^kovida^eb^nti kusala~naa.navanta.m, rathaarohane vaa cheka.m. ^b^aya.m u.laaro^eb^ti aya.m u.laaro mahanto yasoti adhippaayo.
[03] eva.m therena pu.t.tho devaputto imaahi gaathaahi byaakaasi --
[22] ima.m sujaata puujehi, ta.m te atthaaya hehiti..
[03] 1012-3^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0251^ea^ ^b^sariira^eb^ntii sariiradhaatu.m. ^b^hehitii^eb^ti bhavissati. ^b^samuyyuto^eb^ti sammaa uyyutto, yuttappayuttoti attho.

[03] eva.m devaputto therena pucchitamattha.m kathetvaa thera.m vanditvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pitara.m aapucchitvaa ratha.m ^a^P0.0270^ea^ aaruyha devalokameva gato. theropi tamattha.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa sampattaparisaaya vitthaarena dhammakatha.m kathesi. saa dhammakathaa mahaajanassa saatthikaa ahosi. atha thero ta.m sabba.m attanaa ca tena ca kathitaniyaameneva sa"ngiitikaale dhammasa"ngaahakaana.m aarocesi, te ca ta.m tathaa sa"ngaha.m aaropesunti.

[03] ^b^sahassayutta.m hayavaahana.m subha^eb^nti mahaarathavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena ca samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano he.t.thaa vuttanayena devacaarika.m caranto taavati.msabhavane gopaalassa naama devaputtassa attano vimaanato nikkhamitvaa sahassayutta.m mahanta.m dibbaratha.m abhiruyha mahantena parivaarena mahatiyaa deviddhiyaa uyyaanakii.lanattha.m gacchantassa aviduure paaturahosi. ta.m disvaa devaputto sa~njaatagaaravabahumaano sahasaa ^a^V0.0228^ea^ rathato oruyha upasa"nkamitvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa a~njali.m sirasi paggayha a.t.thaasi.

[03] tassida.m pubbakamma.m -- so kira vipassi.m bhagavanta.m suva.n.namaalaaya puujetvaa ``imassa pu~n~nassa aanubhaavena mayha.m bhave bhave sova.n.namayaa uracchadamaalaa nibbattatuu''ti katapa.nidhaanaaya anekakappesu sugatiisuyeva sa.msarantiyaa kassapassa bhagavato kaale kikissa kaasira~n~no aggamahesiyaa kucchimhi nibbattaaya yathaapa.nidhaana.m suva.n.namaalaalaabhena ``uracchadamaalaa''ti laddhanaamaaya devaka~n~naasadisaaya raajadhiitaaya aacariyo gopaalo naama braahma.no hutvaa sasaavakasa"nghassa kassapassa bhagavato asadisadaanaadiini mahaadaanaani pavattetvaa indriyaana.m aparipakkabhaavena attaana.m raajadhiitara~nca uddissa satthaaraa desita.m ^a^M0.0252^ea^ dhamma.m ^a^P0.0271^ea^ sutvaapi visesa.m nibbattetu.m asakkonto puthujjanakaalakiriyameva katvaa yathuupacitapu~n~naanubhaavena taavati.msesu yojanasatike kanakavimaane nibbatti, anekako.tiaccharaaparivaaro ahosi, sattaratanamayo cassa sahassayutto suvibhattabhittivicitto siniddhamadhuranigghoso attano pabhaasamudayena avahasanto viya diva"nkarama.n.dala.m dibbo aaja~n~naratho nibbatti.

[03] so tattha yaavataayuka.m dibbasampatti.m anubhavitvaa aparaapara.m devesuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena yathaavuttasampattivibhavo gopaalo eva naama devaputto hutvaa taavati.msesuyeva nibbatti. ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``tena ca samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano...pe0... a~njali.m sirasi paggayha a.t.thaasii''ti.
[03] eva.m pana upasa"nkamitvaa .thita.m ta.m devaputta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano imaahi gaathaahi pucchi --
[22] uyyaanabhuumi.m abhito anukkama.m, purindado bhuutapatiiva vaasavo..
[21] ``sova.n.namayaa te rathakubbaraa ubho, phalehi a.msehi atiiva sa"ngataa.
[22] sunandighoso ca subhassaro ca, virocatii caamarahatthabaahubhi..
[22] imaa ca naabhyo sataraajicittitaa, saterataa vijjurivappabhaasare..
[21] ``anekacittaavatato ^a^P0.0272^ea^ ratho aya.m, puthuu ca nemii ca sahassara.msiko.
[22] tesa.m saro suyyati vagguruupo, pa~nca"ngika.m tuuriyamivappavaadita.m..
[21] ``sirasmi.m citta.m ma.nicandakappita.m, sadaa visuddha.m rucira.m pabhassara.m.
[22] suva.n.naraajiihi atiiva sa"ngata.m, ve.luriyaraajiiva atiiva sobhati..
[21] ``ime ca vaa.lii ma.nicandakappitaa, aarohakambuu sujavaa brahuupamaa.
[22] brahaa mahantaa balino mahaajavaa, mano tava~n~naaya tatheva si.msare..
[21] ``ime ca sabbe sahitaa catukkamaa, mano tava~n~naaya tatheva si.msare.
[22] sama.m vahantii mudukaa anuddhataa, aamodamaanaa turagaanamuttamaa..
[21] ``dhunanti vagganti patanti cambare, abbhuddhunantaa sukate pi.landhane.
[22] tesa.m saro suyyati vagguruupo, pa~nca"ngika.m tuuriyamivappavaadita.m..
[21] ``rathassa ghoso api.landhanaana ca, khurassa naado abhihi.msanaaya ca.
[22] ghoso suvagguu samitassa suyyati, gandhabbatuuriyaani vicitrasa.mvane..
[22] kule sujaataa sutanuu sucimhitaa, rathe .thitaa pa~njalikaa upa.t.thitaa..
[22] va.t.ta"nguliyo sumukhaa sudassanaa, rathe .thitaa pa~njalikaa upa.t.thitaa..
[21] ``a~n~naa suve.nii susu missakesiyo, sama.m vibhattaahi pabhassaraahi ca.
[22] anubbataa taa tava maanase rataa, rathe .thitaa pa~njalikaa upa.t.thitaa..
[22] anubbataa taa tava maanase rataa, rathe .thitaa pa~njalikaa upa.t.thitaa..
[22] anubbataa taa tava maanase rataa, rathe .thitaa pa~njalikaa upa.t.thitaa..
[21] ``ka.n.thesu te yaani pi.landhanaani, hatthesu paadesu tatheva siise.
[22] obhaasayantii dasa sabbaso disaa, abbhuddaya.m saaradikova bhaa.numaa..
[21] ``vaatassa ^a^M0.0255^ea^ vegena ca sampakampitaa, bhujesu maalaa api.landhanaani ca.
[22] mu~ncanti ghosa.m rucira.m suci.m subha.m, sabbehi vi~n~nuuhi sutabbaruupa.m..
[21] ``uyyaanabhuumyaa ^a^P0.0274^ea^ ca duvaddhato .thitaa, rathaa ca naagaa tuuriyaani ca saro.
[22] tameva devinda pamodayanti, vii.naa yathaa pokkharapattabaahubhi..
[21] ``imaasu vii.naasu bahuusu vagguusu, manu~n~naruupaasu hadayerita.m piiti.m.
[22] pavajjamaanaasu atiiva accharaa, bhamanti ka~n~naa padumesu sikkhitaa..
[21] ``yadaa ca giitaani ca vaaditaani ca, naccaani cimaani samenti ekato.
[22] athettha naccanti athettha accharaa, obhaasayantii ubhato varitthiyo..
[22] imaasu vii.naasu bahuusu vagguusu, manu~n~naruupaasu hadayerita.m piiti.m..
[21] ``ki.m ^a^V0.0231^ea^ tva.m pure kammamakaasi attanaa, manussabhuuto purimaaya jaatiyaa.
[22] uposatha.m ka.m vaa tuva.m upaavasi, ka.m dhammacariya.m vatamaabhirocayi..
[21] ``nayiidamappassa katassa kammuno, pubbe suci.n.nassa uposathassa vaa.
[22] iddhaanubhaavo vipulo aya.m tava, ya.m devasa"ngha.m abhirocase bhusa.m..
[21] ``daanassa ^a^M0.0256^ea^ te ida.m phala.m, atho siilassa vaa pana.
[22] atho a~njalikammassa, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito''ti..

[03] 1015^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sahassayutta^eb^nti sahassena yutta.m, sahassa.m vaa yutta.m yojita.m etasminti sahassayutta.m. kassa paneta.m ^a^P0.0275^ea^ sahassanti? ``hayavaahana''nti anantara.m vuccamaanattaa hayaananti ayamattho vi~n~naayateva. hayaa vaahana.m etassaati hayavaahana.m. keci pana ``sahassayuttahayavaahana''nti anunaasikalopa.m ekameva samaasapada.m katvaa va.n.nenti, etasmi.m pakkhe hayavaahana.m viya vaahananti attho yujjati. hayavaahanasahassayutta.m yuttahayavaahanasahassanti hi attho. apare pana ``sahassayuttanti sahassadibbaaja~n~nayutta''nti vadanti. ^b^sandana^eb^nti ratha.m. ^b^nekacitta^eb^nti anekacitta.m naanaavidhavicittavanta.m. ^b^uyyaanabhuumi.m abhito^eb^ti uyyaanabhuumiyaa samiipe. ``abhito''ti hi pada.m apekkhitvaa saamiatthe eta.m upayogavacana.m. keci pana ``uyyaanabhuumyaa''tipi pa.thanti, te saddanayampi anupadhaarentaa pa.thanti. ^b^anukkama^eb^nti gacchanto purindado bhuutapatiiva vaasavo virocasiiti sambandho.

[03] 1016^b^.^eb^ ^b^sova.n.namayaa^eb^ti suva.n.namayaa. ^b^te^eb^ti tava. ^b^rathakubbaraa ubho^eb^ti rathassa ubhosu passesu vedikaa. yo hi rathassa sobhanattha~nceva upari .thitaana.m guttattha~nca ubhosu passesu vedikaakaarena parikkhepo kariiyati, tassa purimabhaage ubhosu passesu yaava rathiisaa, taava hatthehi gaha.nayoggo rathassa avayavaviseso, idha so eva kubbaroti adhippeto. tenevaaha ``ubho''ti. a~n~nattha pana rathiisaa kubbaroti vuccati. ^b^phalehii^eb^ti rathuupatthambhassa dakkhi.navaamabhedehi dviihi phalehi, pariyantaavettha phalaati vuttaa. ^b^a.msehii^eb^ti kubbaraphale pati.t.thitehi he.t.thimaa.msehi. ^b^atiiva sa"ngataa^eb^ti ativiya su.t.thu sa"ngataa suphassitaa nibbivaraa. ida~nca sippiviracite kittimarathe labbhamaanavisesa.m tattha aaropetvaa vutta.m. so pana aporisataaya akittimo saya.mjaato ^a^P0.0276^ea^ kenaci agha.titoyeva. ^b^sujaatagumbaa^eb^ti susa.n.thitathambhakasamudaayaa. ye hi vedikaaya nirantara.m .thitaa susa.n.thitagha.takaadiavayavavisesavanto ^a^V0.0232^ea^ thambhakasamudaayaa, tesa.m ^a^M0.0257^ea^ vaseneva.m vutta.m ``sujaatagumbaa''ti. ^b^naraviirani.t.thitaa^eb^ti sippaacariyehi ni.t.thaapitasadisaa. sippaacariyaa hi attano sariirakheda.m acintetvaa viiriyabalena sippassa su.t.thu vicaara.nato naresu viiriyavantoti idha ``naraviiraa''ti vuttaa. ^b^naraviiraa^eb^ti vaa devaputtassa aalapana.m. ^b^ni.t.thitaa^eb^ti pariyositaa paripu.n.nasobhaatisayaa. ``naraviiranimmitaa''ti vaa paa.tho, naresu dhitisampannehi nimmitasadisaati attho. eva.mvidhakubbarataaya aya.m tava ratho virocati. ki.m viya? ^b^pannaraseva cando,^eb^ sukkapakkhe pannarasiya.m paripu.n.nakaale candimaa viya.

[03] 1017^b^.^eb^ ^b^suva.n.najaalaavatato^eb^ti suva.n.najaalakehi avatato chaadito. ``suva.n.najaalaavitato''tipi paa.tho, gavacchitoti attho. ^b^bahuuhii^eb^ti anekehi. ^b^naanaaratanehii^eb^ti padumaraagaphussaraagaadinaanaavidharatanehi. ^b^sunandighoso^eb^ti su.t.thu nanditabbaghoso, savaniiyamadhuraninnaadoti attho. ^b^sunandighoso^eb^ti vaa su.t.thu katanandighoso, naccanaadiina.m dassanaadiisu pavattitasaadhukaarasaddaadivasena katapamodaninnaadoti attho, ``kaalena kaala.m aasiivaadanavasena su.t.thu payuttanandighoso''ti ca vadanti. ^b^subhassaro^eb^ti su.t.thu ativiya obhaasanasabhaavo, tattha vaa pavattamaanaana.m devataana.m sobhanena giitavaaditassarena subhassaro. ^b^caamarahatthabaahubhii^eb^ti caamarahatthayuttabaahuuhi ito cito ca biijayamaana caamarakalaapehi devataana.m bhujehi, tathaabhuutaahi devataahi vaa virocati.

[03] 1018^b^.^eb^ ^b^naabhyo^eb^ti rathacakkaana.m naabhiyo. ^b^manasaabhinimmitaa^eb^ti ``ime iidisaa hontuu''ti cittena nimmitasadisaa. ^b^rathassa^eb^ ^a^P0.0277^ea^ ^b^paadantaramajjhabhuusitaa^eb^ti rathassa paadaana.m rathacakkaana.m antena neminaa naanaaratanasamujjalena araana.m vemajjhena ca ma.n.ditaa. ^b^sataraajicittitaa^eb^ti anekava.n.naahi anekasataahi raajiihi lekhaahi cittitaa vicittabhaava.m gataa. ^b^saterataa vijjurivaa^eb^ti sateratasa"nkhaatavijjulataa viya pabhaasare vijjotanti.

[03] 1019^b^.^eb^ ^b^anekacittaavatato^eb^ti ^a^M0.0258^ea^ anekehi maalaakammaadicittehi avatato samoki.n.no. ``anekacittaavitato''tipi pa.thanti, soyeva attho, gaathaasukhattha.m pana diighakara.na.m. ^b^puthuu ca nemii caa^eb^ti puthulanemi ca, eko ca-kaaro nipaatamatta.m. ^b^sahassara.msiko^eb^ti anekasahassara.msiko. ``sahassara.msiyo''tipi paa.li. apare pana ``nataa ra.msiyo''ti ca pa.thanti, tattha ^b^nataa^eb^ti ajiyadhanuda.n.dako viya o.nataa nemippadesaa. ^b^sahassara.msiyo^eb^ti suuriyama.n.dala.m viya vipphurantakira.najaalaa. ^b^tesa^eb^nti olambamaanaki"nki.nikajaalaana.m nemippadesaana.m.

[03] 1020^b^.^eb^ ^b^sirasmi^eb^nti ^a^V0.0233^ea^ siise, rathassa siiseti attho. siro vaa asmi.m rathe. ^b^citta^eb^nti vicitta.m. ^b^ma.nicandakappita^eb^nti ma.nimayama.n.dalaanuviddha.m candama.n.dalasadisena ma.ninaa anuviddha.m. ^b^rucira.m pabhassara^eb^nti iminaa tassa candama.n.dalasadisata.myeva vibhaaveti, ^b^sadaa visuddha^eb^nti iminaa panassa candama.n.dalatopi visesa.m dasseti. ^b^suva.n.naraajiihii^eb^ti antarantaraa va.t.taakaarena sa.n.thitaahi suva.n.nalekhaahi. ^b^sa"ngata^eb^nti sahita.m. ^b^ve.luriyaraajiivaa^eb^ti antarantaraa suva.n.naraajiihi khacitama.nima.n.dalattaa ve.luriyaraajiihi viya sobhati. ``ve.luriyaraajiihii''ti ca pa.thanti.

[03] 1021^b^.^eb^ ^b^vaa.lii^eb^ti vaa.lavanto sampannavaa.ladhino, asse sandhaaya vadati ^a^P0.0278^ea^. ``vaajii''ti vaa paa.tho. ^b^ma.nicandakappitaa^eb^ti caamarolambana.t.thaanesu ma.nimayacandakaanuviddhaa. ^b^aarohakambuu^eb^ti uccaa ceva tadanuruupapari.naahaa ca, aarohapari.naahasampannaati attho. ^b^sujavaa^eb^ti sundarajavaa javavanto ^b^mahaajavaa,^eb^ sobhanagatikaati attho. ^b^brahuupamaa^eb^ti brahaa viya paminitabbaa, attano pamaa.nato adhikaa viya pa~n~naayantaati attho. ^b^brahaa^eb^ti vu.d.dhaa pava.d.dhasabba"ngapacca"ngaa. ^b^mahantaa^eb^ti mahaanubhaavaa mahiddhikaa. ^b^balino^eb^ti sariirabalena ca ussaahabalena ca balavanto. ^b^mahaajavaa^eb^ti siighavegaa. ^b^mano tava~n~naayaa^eb^ti tava citta.m ~natvaa. ^b^tathevaa^eb^ti cittaanuruupameva. ^b^si.msare^eb^ti sa.msappare, pavattareti attho.

[03] 1022^b^.^eb^ ^b^ime^eb^ti yathaavuttaasse sandhaayaaha. ^b^sabbe^eb^ti sahassamattaapi. ^b^sahitaa^eb^ti samaanajavataaya samaanagamanataaya ca gatiya.m sahitaa, a~n~nama~n~na.m anuunaadhikagamanaati attho. catuuhi paadehi kamanti ^a^M0.0259^ea^ gacchantiiti ^b^catukkamaa. sama.m vahantii^eb^ti ``sahitaa''ti padena vuttamevattha.m paaka.tatara.m karoti. ^b^mudukaa^eb^ti mudusabhaavaa, bhadraa aajaaniiyaati attho. tenaaha ^b^``anuddhataa''^eb^ti, uddhatarahitaa khobha.m akarontaati attho. ^b^aamodamaanaa^eb^ti pamodamaanaa, akha.lu"nkataaya a~n~nama~n~na.m rathikaadiina~nca tu.t.thi.m pavedayantaati attho.

[03] 1023^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhunantii^eb^ti caamarabhaara.m kesarabhaara.m vaaladhi~nca vidhunanti. ^b^vaggantii^eb^ti kadaaci pade pada.m nikkhipantaa vagganena gamanena gacchanti. ^b^patantii^eb^ti kadaaci pavattanti, la"nghantiiti attho. ``plavantii''ti ca keci pa.thanti, soyevattho. ^b^abbhuddhunantaa^eb^ti kammasippinaa sukate su.t.thu ^a^P0.0279^ea^ nimmite khuddakagha.n.taadiassaala"nkaare abhiuddhunantaa adhika.m uddhunantaa. ^b^tesa^eb^nti tesa.m pi.landhanaana.m.

[03] 1024^b^.^eb^ ^b^rathassa ghoso^eb^ti yathaavutto rathanigghoso. ^b^api.landhanaana caa^eb^ti a-kaaro nipaatamatta.m ^a^V0.0234^ea^. pi.landhanaana.m aabhara.naana.m. api.landhananti ca aabhara.napariyaayoti vaa vadanti, rathassaana.m aabhara.naana~ncaghosoti attho. ^b^khurassanaado^eb^ti tura"ngaana.m khuranipaatasaddo. ki~ncaapi assaa aakaasena gacchanti, madhurassa pana khuranipaatasaddassa upaladdhihetubhuutena kammunaa tesa.m khuranikkhepe khuranikkhepe pa.tighaato labbhatiiti vadanti. ^b^abhihi.msanaaya caa^eb^ti assaana.m adhikahi.msanena ca, antarantaraa assehi pavattitahesanena caati attho. ``abhihesanaaya caa''ti keci pa.thanti. ^b^samitassaa^eb^ti samuditassa dibbajanassa ghoso ca suvaggu sumadhura.m suyyati. ki.m viyaati aaha ^b^``gandhabbatuuriyaani vicitrasa.mvane''^eb^ti, citralataavane gandhabbadevaputtaana.m pa~nca"ngikatuuriyaani viya. tuuriyasannissito hi saddo ``tuuriyaanii''ti vutto nissayavohaarena. ``gandhabbatuuriyaana ca vicitrasa.mvane''ti ca paa.tho, ``tuuriyaana~nca''iti anunaasika.m aanetvaa yojetabba.m. apare ``gandhabbatuuriyaani vicitrapavane''ti pa.thanti.

[03] 1025^b^.^eb^ ^b^rathe .thitaataa^eb^ti rathe .thitaa etaa. ^b^migamandalocanaa^eb^ti migacchaapikaana.m viya mudusiniddhadi.t.thinipaataa. ^b^aa.laarapamhaa^eb^ti bahalasa"ngatapakhumaa, gopakhumaati attho. ^b^hasitaa^eb^ti pahasitaa, paha.msitamukhaati attho ^a^M0.0260^ea^. ^b^piya.mvadaa^eb^ti piyavaadiniyo. ^b^ve.luriyajaalaavatataa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0280^ea^ ve.luriyama.nimayena jaalena chaaditasariiraa. ^b^tanucchavaa^eb^ti sukhumacchaviyo. ^b^sadevaa^eb^ti sadaa eva sabbakaalameva. ^b^gandhabbasuuraggapuujitaa^eb^ti gandhabbadevataahi ceva aparaahi ca aggadevataahi laddhapuujaa.

[03] 1026^b^.^eb^ ^b^taa rattarattambarapiitavaasasaa^eb^ti rajaniiyaruupaa ca rattapiitavatthaa ca. ^b^abhirattalocanaa^eb^ti visesato rattaraajiihi upasobhitanayanaa. ^b^kule sujaataa^eb^ti sindhavakule sujaataa visi.t.thadevanikaaye sambhavaa. ^b^sutanuu^eb^ti sundarasariiraa. ^b^sucimhitaa^eb^ti suddhasitakara.naa.

[03] 1027^b^.^eb^ ^b^taa kambukeyuuradharaa^eb^ti suva.n.namayakeyuuradharaa. ^b^sumajjhimaa^eb^ti vilaggamajjhaa. ^b^uuruthanuupapannaa^eb^ti sampannauuruthanaa, kadalikkhandhasadisauuru ceva samuggasadisathanaa ca. ^b^va.t.ta"nguliyo^eb^ti anupubbato va.t.ta"nguliyo. ^b^sumukhaa^eb^ti sundaramukhaa, pamuditamukhaa vaa. ^b^sudassanaa^eb^ti dassaniiyaa.

[03] 1028^b^.^eb^ ^b^a~n~naa^eb^ti ekaccaa. ^b^suve.nii^eb^ti sundarakesave.niyo. ^b^susuu^eb^ti daharaa. ^b^missakesiyo^eb^ti rattamaalaadiihi missitakesava.t.tiyo. katha.m? ^b^sama.m vibhattaahi pabhassaraahi caa^eb^ti, sama.m a~n~nama~n~nasadisa.m naanaavibhattivasena vibhattaahi suva.n.naciiraadikhacitaahi indaniilama.niaadayo ^a^V0.0235^ea^ viya pabhassaraahi kesava.t.tiihi missitakesiyoti yojanaa. ^b^anubbataa^eb^ti anukuulakiriyaa. ^b^taa^eb^ti accharaayo.

[03] 1031^b^.^eb^ ^b^ka.n.thesuu^eb^tiaadinaa giivuupagahatthuupagapaaduupagasiisuupagaadiaabhara.naani dasseti. ^b^obhaasayantii^eb^ti ka.n.thesu yaani pi.landhanaani, tehi obhaasayantiiti yojanaa. eva.m sesesupi. ^b^abbhuddaya^eb^nti abhiuggacchanto, ``abbhuddasa''ntipi paa.tho, soyevattho. ^b^saaradiko^eb^ti saradakaaliko. ^b^bhaa.numaa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0281^ea^ suuriyo. so hi abbhaadidosavirahena dasapi disaa su.t.thu obhaaseti.

[03] 1032^b^.^eb^ ^bvaatassa ^b^vegena caa^eb^ti manu~n~nagandhuupahaara.m sadduupahaara~nca karontena upaharantena viya vaayantena vaatassa vegena rathatura"ngavegena ca. ^b^mu~ncantii^eb^ti ^a^M0.0261^ea^ vissajjenti. ^b^rucira^eb^nti pa~nca"ngikatuuriyaani viya uparuupari rucidaayaka.m. ^b^suci^eb^nti suddha.m asa.msa.t.tha.m. ^b^subha^eb^nti manu~n~na.m. ^b^sabbehi vi~n~nuuhi sutabbaruupa^eb^nti sabbehipi vi~n~nujaatikehi gandhabbasamaya~n~nuuhi sotabba.m savaniiya.m uttamasabhaava.m ghosa.m mu~ncantiiti yojanaa.

[03] 1033^b^.^eb^ ^b^uyyaanabhuumyaa^eb^ti uyyaanabhuumiya.m. ^b^duvaddhato^eb^ti dviihi addhapassehi. ``dubhato ca .thitaa''tipi pa.thanti, soyevattho. ^b^rathaa^eb^ti rathe. ^b^naagaa^eb^ti naage. upayogatthe hi eta.m paccattavacana.m. ^b^saro^eb^ti rathanaagatuuriyaani pa.ticca nibbatto saro. ^b^devindaa^eb^ti devaputta.m aalapati. ^b^vii.naa yathaa pokkharapattabaahubhii^eb^ti yathaa vii.naa sammadeva yojitehi do.nipattabaahuda.n.dehi ta.mta.mmucchanaanuruupa.m ava.t.thitehi vaadiyamaanaa su.nanta.m jana.m pamodeti, eva.m ta.m rathaadayo attano sarena pamodayanti. susikkhitabhaavena pokkharabhaava.m sundarabhaava.m pattehi vii.naavaadakassa hatthehi pavaaditaa vii.naa yathaa mahaajana.m pamodeti, eva.m ta.m rathaadayo attano sarena pamodayantiiti.

[03] 1034^b^.^eb^ ^b^imaasu vii.naasuu^eb^ti gaathaaya aya.m sa"nkhepattho -- ^b^imaasu^eb^ ujuko.tiva"nkabrahatiinandiniitisaraaadibhedaasu ^b^bahuusu vii.naasu^eb^ siniddhamadhurassarataaya ^b^vagguusu^eb^ tato eva ^b^manu~n~naruupaasu hadayerita.m^eb^ hadaya"ngama.m hadayahaarini.m ^b^piiti.m^eb^ piitinimitta.m ^b^pavajjamaanaasu^eb^ pavaadiyamaanaasu ^a^V0.0236^ea^ ^b^accharaa^eb^ deva^b^ka~n~naa^eb^ piitivegukkhittataaya attano ^a^P0.0282^ea^ susikkhitataaya ca dibba^b^padumesu bhamanti^eb^ nacca.m dassentiyo sa~ncaranti.

[03] 1035^b^.^eb^ ^b^imaanii^eb^ti ida.m pacceka.m yojetabba.m ``imaani giitaani, imaani vaaditaani, imaani naccaani caa''ti. ^b^samenti ekato^eb^ti ekajjha.m samarasaani honti. atha vaa ^b^samenti ekato^eb^ti ekato ekajjha.m samaani samarasaani karonti, tantissara.m giitassarena, giitassara~nca tantissarena sa.msandantiyo naccanena yathaadhigate hassaadirase aparihaapentiyo samenti samaanentiiti attho. ^b^atthettha naccanti athettha accharaa obhaasayantii^eb^ti eva.m giitaadiini samarase karontiyo atha a~n~naa ekaccaa accharaa ettha etasmi.m tava rathe naccanti, atha a~n~naa varitthiyo uttamitthiyo nacca.m passantiyo attano sariirobhaasena ceva vatthaabhara.naobhaasena ca ettha ^a^M0.0262^ea^ etasmi.m padese ubhato dviisu passesu dasapi disaa kevala.m obhaasayanti vijjotayantiiti attho.

[03] 1036^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ti so tva.m eva.mbhuuto. ^b^tuuriyaga.nappabodhano^eb^ti dibbatuuriyasamuuhena katapiitipabodhano. ^b^mahiiyamaano^eb^ti puujiiyamaano. ^b^vajiraavudhorivaa^eb^ti indo viya.

[03] 1037^b^.^eb^ ^b^uposatha.m ka.m vaa tuva.m upaavasii^eb^ti a~n~nehipi uposatho upavasiiyati, tva.m ka.m vaa kiidisa.m naama uposatha.m upavasiiti pucchati. ^b^dhammacariya^eb^nti daanaadipu~n~napa.tipatti.m. ^b^vata^eb^nti vatasamaadaana.m. ^b^abhirocayii^eb^ti abhirocesi, ruccitvaa puuresiiti attho. ``abhiraadhayii''tipi paa.tho, saadhesi nipphaadesiiti attho.
[03] 1038^b^.^eb^ ^b^ida^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m, ida.m vaa phalanti adhippaayo. ^b^abhirocase^eb^ti abhibhavitvaa vijjotasi.
[03] eva.m mahaatherena pu.t.tho devaputto tamattha.m aacikkhi. tena vutta.m --
[22] pa~nha.m pu.t.tho viyaakaasi, yassa kammassida.m phala''nti..
[22] disvaana ta.m khippamahu.m suciimano, tameva disvaana subhaasitaddhaja.m..
[21] ``tamannapaana.m athavaapi ciivara.m, suci.m pa.niita.m rasasaa upeta.m.
[22] pupphaabhiki.n.namhi sake nivesane, pati.t.thapesi.m sa asa"ngamaanaso..
[21] ``tamannapaanena ^a^M0.0263^ea^ ca ciivarena ca, khajjena bhojjena ca saayanena ca.
[22] santappayitvaa dvipadaanamuttama.m, so saggaso devapure ramaamaha.m..
[21] ``etenupaayena ima.m niragga.la.m, ya~n~na.m yajitvaa tividha.m visuddha.m.
[22] pahaayaha.m maanusaka.m samussaya.m, induupamo devapure ramaamaha.m..
[21] ``aayu~nca va.n.na~nca sukha.m bala~nca, pa.niitaruupa.m atika"nkhataa muni.
[21] ``nayimasmi.m loke parasmi.m vaa pana, buddhena se.t.tho va samo va vijjati.

[03] 1041^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^jitindriya^eb^nti manaccha.t.thaana.m indriyaana.m bodhimuuleyeva aggamaggena jitattaa nibbisevanabhaavassa katattaa jitindriya.m. abhi~n~neyyaadiina.m abhi~n~neyyaadibhaavato anavasesato abhisambuddhattaa ^b^buddha.m^eb^. puripu.n.naviiriyataaya ^b^anomanikkama.m^eb^ catura"ngasamannaagatassa viiriyassa catubbidhasammappadhaanassa ca paaripuuriyaati attho. ^b^naruttama^eb^nti naraana.m uttama.m dvipaduttama.m. ^b^kassapa^eb^nti bhagavanta.m gottena vadati. ^b^avaapuranta.m amatassa dvaara^eb^nti ko.naagamanassa bhagavato saasanantaradhaanato pabhuti pihita.m nibbaanamahaanagarassa dvaara.m ariyamagga.m vivaranta.m. ^b^devaatideva^eb^nti sabbesampi devaana.m atideva.m. ^b^satapu~n~nalakkha.na^eb^nti anekasatapu~n~navasena nibbattamahaapurisalakkha.na.m.

[03] 1042^b^.^eb^ ^b^ku~njara^eb^nti ^a^V0.0238^ea^ kilesapa.tisattunimmaddanena ku~njarasadisa.m, mahaanaaganti attho. catunna.m oghaana.m sa.msaaramahoghassa taritattaa ^b^oghati.n.na.m^eb^. ^b^suva.n.nasi"ngiinadabimbasaadisa^eb^nti ^a^M0.0264^ea^ si"ngiisuva.n.najambunadasuva.n.naruupasadisa.m, ka~ncanasannibhattacanti attho. ^b^disvaana ta.m khippamahu.m suciimano^eb^ti ta.m kassapasammaasambuddha.m disvaa khippa.m taavadeva ``sammaasambuddho bhagavaa''ti pasaadavasena kilesamalaapagamanena sucimano visuddhamano ahosi.m, ta~nca kho ^b^tameva disvaana^eb^ ta.m disvaa eva. ^b^subhaasitaddhaja^eb^nti dhammaddhaja.m.

[03] 1043^b^.^eb^ ^b^tamannapaana^eb^nti tamhi bhagavati anna~nca paana~nca. ^b^athavaapi ciivara^eb^nti atha ciivarampi. ^b^rasasaa upeta^eb^nti rasena upeta.m saadurasa.m, u.laaranti attho ^a^P0.0285^ea^. ^b^pupphaabhiki.n.namhii^eb^ti ganthitehi ca aganthikehi ca pupphehi olambanavasena santhara.navasena ca abhiki.n.ne. ^b^pati.t.thapesi^eb^nti pa.tipaadesi.m adaasi.m. ^b^asa"ngamaanaso^eb^ti katthaci alaggacitto so ahanti yojanaa.
[03] 1044^b^.^eb^ ^b^saggaso^eb^ti aparaaparuupapattivasena sagge sagge, tatthaapi ca devapure sudassanamahaanagare. ^b^ramaamii^eb^ti kii.laami modaami.

[03] 1045^b^.^eb^ ^b^etenupaayenaa^eb^ti gopaalabraahma.nakaale sasaavakasa"nghassa kassapabhagavato yathaa asadisadaana.m adaasi.m, etena upaayena. ^b^ima.m niragga.la.m ya~n~na.m yajitvaa tividha.m visuddha^eb^nti anaava.tadvaarataaya muttacaagataaya ca niragga.la.m, tiisupi kaalesu tiihi dvaarehi kara.nakaaraapanaanussara.navidhiihi sampannataaya tividha.m, tattha sa.mkilesaabhaavena visuddha.m aparimitadhanapariccaagabhaavena mahaacaagataaya ya~n~na.m yajitvaa, mahaadaana.m datvaati attho. ta.m pana daana.m cirakatampi khettavatthucittaana.m u.laarataaya antarantaraa anussara.nena attano paaka.ta.m aasanna.m paccakkha.m viya upa.t.thita.m gahetvaa aaha ``ima''nti.

[03] 1046^b^.^eb^ eva.m devaputto attanaa katakamma.m therassa kathetvaa idaani taadisaaya sampattiyaa parepi pati.t.thaapetukaamata.m tathaagate ca uttama.m attano pasaadabahumaana.m pavedento ^b^``aayu~nca va.n.na~ncaa''^eb^tiaadinaa gaathaadvayamaaha. tattha ^b^abhika"nkhataa^eb^ti icchantena. ^b^munii^eb^ti thera.m aalapati.

[03] 1047^b^.^eb^ ^b^nayimasmi.m loke^eb^ti devaputto attano paccakkhabhuuta.m loka.m vadati. ^b^parasmi^eb^nti tato a~n~nasmi.m. etena sabbepi sadevake loke ^a^M0.0265^ea^ dasseti. ^b^samo ca vijjatii^eb^ti se.t.tho taava ti.t.thatu ^a^V0.0239^ea^, samo eva na vijjatiiti attho. ^b^aahuneyyaana.m paramaahuti.m gato^eb^ti imasmi.m loke yattakaa aahuneyyaa naama, tesu sabbesu paramaahuti.m parama.m aahuneyyabhaava.m ^a^P0.0286^ea^ gato. ``dakkhi.neyyaana.m paramaggata.m gato''ti vaa paa.tho, tattha ^b^paramaggata^eb^nti parama.m aggabhaava.m, aggadakkhi.neyyabhaavanti attho. kesanti aaha ^b^``pu~n~natthikaana.m vipulapphalesina''^eb^nti, pu~n~nena atthikaana.m vipula.m mahanta.m pu~n~naphala.m icchantaana.m, tathaagato eva lokassa pu~n~nakkhettanti dasseti. keci pana ``aahuneyyaana.m paramaggata.m gato''ti pa.thanti, soyevattho.

[03] eva.m kathentameva ta.m thero kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta~nca ~natvaa saccaani pakaasesi. so saccapariyosaane sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi. atha thero manussaloka.m aagantvaa bhagavato tamattha.m attanaa ca devaputtena ca kathitaniyaameneva aarocesi. satthaa tamattha.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa sampattapariyaaya dhamma.m desesi. saa desanaa mahaajanassa saatthikaa ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^yathaa^eb^ ^a^V0.0240^ea^ ^b^vana.m cittalata.m pabhaasatii^eb^ti agaariyavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. tena samayena raajagahe eka.m kula.m ubhatopasanna.m hoti siilaacaarasampanna.m opaanabhuuta.m bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m. te dve jayampatikaa ratanattaya.m uddissa yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cutaa taavati.msesu nibbatti.msu, tesa.m dvaadasayojanika.m kanakavimaana.m nibbatti. te tattha dibbasampatti.m anubhavanti. athaayasmaa ^a^M0.0266^ea^ mahaamoggallaanotiaadi he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva veditabba.m.
[22] tathuupama.m tuyhamida.m vimaana.m, obhaasaya.m ti.t.thati antalikkhe..
[22] kenaasi eva.m jalitaanubhaavo, va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti.. --
[22] pa~nha.m pu.t.tho viyaakaasi, yassa kammassida.m phala.m''..
[22] anna~nca paana~nca pasannacittaa, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adamha..
[25] attano sampatti.m byaakaasi. gaathaasupi apubba.m natthi.

[22] va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti.. -- pucchi.
[22] anna~nca paana~nca pasannacittaa, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adamha..
[25] attano sampatti.m byaakaasi. gaathaasupi apubba.m natthi.

[03] ^b^uccamida.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0242^ea^ ^b^ma.nithuu.na^eb^nti phaladaayakavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. tena samayena ra~n~no bimbisaarassa akaale ambaphalaani paribhu~njitu.m icchaa uppajji. so aaraamapaala.m aaha -- ``mayha.m kho, bha.ne, ambaphalesu icchaa uppannaa, tasmaa ambaani me aanetvaa ^a^M0.0268^ea^ dehii''ti. ``deva, natthi ambesu ambaphala.m, apicaaha.m tathaa karomi, sace devo ki~nci kaala.m aagameti, yathaa ambaa na cirasseva phala.m ga.nhantii''ti. ``saadhu, bha.ne, tathaa karohii''ti. aaraamapaalo aaraama.m gantvaa ambarukkhamuulesu pa.msu.m apanetvaa taadisa.m pa.msu.m aakiri, taadisa~nca udaka.m aasi~nci, yathaa na cirasseva ambarukkhaa sacchinnapattaa ahesu.m. atha na.m pa.msu.m apanetvaa phaarusakakasa.tamissaka.m paakatika.m pa.msu.m aakiritvaa saadhuka.m udaka.m adaasi. tadaa ambarukkhaa na cireneva korakitaa pallavitaa ku.tamalakajaataa hutvaa pupphi.msu, atha salaa.tukajaataa hutvaa phalaani ga.nhi.msu. tatthekasmi.m ambarukkhe pa.thamatara.m cattaari phalaani manosilaacu.n.napi~njarava.n.naani sampannagandharasaani pari.nataani ahesu.m.

[03] so taani gahetvaa ``ra~n~no dassaamii''ti gacchanto antaraamagge aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m pi.n.daaya caramaana.m disvaa cintesi ``imaani ambaani aggaphalabhuutaani imassa ayyassa dassaami ^a^P0.0289^ea^, kaama.m ma.m raajaa hanatu vaa pabbaajetu vaa, ra~n~no hi dinne di.t.thadhamme puujaamatta.m appamattaka.m phala.m, ayyassa dinne pana di.t.thadhammikampi samparaayikampi aparimaa.na.m phala.m bhavissatii''ti. eva.m pana cintetvaa taani phalaani therassa datvaa raajaana.m upasa"nkamitvaa ra~n~no tamattha.m aarocesi. ta.m sutvaa raajaa raajapurise aa.naapesi ``viima.msatha taava, bha.ne, yathaaya.m aahaa''ti. thero pana taani phalaani bhagavato upanaamesi. bhagavaa tesu eka.m saariputtattherassa, eka.m mahaamoggallaanattherassa, eka.m mahaakassapattherassa datvaa eka.m attanaa paribhu~nji. purisaa ta.m pavatti.m ra~n~no aarocesu.m.

[03] raajaa ta.m sutvaa ``dhiiro vataaya.m puriso, yo attano jiivitampi pariccajitvaa pu~n~napasuto ahosi, attano parissama~nca .thaanagatameva akaasii''ti tu.t.thacitto tassa eka.m gaamavara.m vatthaala"nkaaraadiini ca datvaa ``ya.m tayaa bha.ne ambaphaladaanena pu~n~na.m pasuta.m, tato me patti.m dehii''ti aaha. so ``demi, deva, yathaasukha.m patti.m ga.nhaahii''ti avoca. aaraamapaalo aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu uppajji ^a^M0.0269^ea^, tassa so.lasayojanika.m kanakavimaana.m nibbatti sattasatakuu.taagaarapa.tima.n.dita.m. ta.m disvaa aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano pucchi --
[22] kuu.taagaaraa sattasataa u.laaraa, ve.luriyathambhaa rucakatthataa subhaa..
[21] ``tatthacchasi pivasi khaadasi ca, dibbaa ca vii.naa pavadanti vaggu.m.
[27] a.t.tha.t.thakaa sikkhitaa saadhuruupaa, dibbaa ca ka~n~naa tidasacaraa u.laaraa.
[22] so hi pamodati saggagato tidive, anubhoti ca pu~n~naphala.m vipula.m..
[21] ``tasmaa hi phala.m alameva daatu.m, nicca.m manussena sukhatthikena.
[22] dibbaani vaa patthayataa sukhaani, manussasobhaggatamicchataa vaa..
[22] va.n.no ca me sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti.. -- sopissa byaakaasi.

[03] 1061^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^a.t.tha.t.thakaa^eb^ti ekekasmi.m kuu.taagaare a.t.tha.t.thakaa catusa.t.thiparimaa.naa. ^b^saadhuruupaa^eb^ti ruupasampattiyaa ca siilaacaarasampattiyaa ca sikkhaasampattiyaa ca sundarasabhaavaa. ^b^dibbaa ca ka~n~naa^eb^ti devaccharaayo. ^b^tidasacaraa^eb^ti tidasesu sukhaacaaraa sukhavihaariniyo. ^b^u.laaraa^eb^ti u.laaravibhavaa.

[03] 1064^b^.^eb^ ^b^phaladaayii^eb^ti attanaa ambaphalassa dinnattaa attaana.m sandhaaya vadati. ^b^phala^eb^nti pu~n~naphala.m. ^b^vipula^eb^nti mahanta.m labhati manussaloke pati.t.thitoti adhippaayo. ^b^dada^eb^nti dadanto ^a^V0.0244^ea^ daanahetu. ^b^ujugatesuu^eb^ti ujupa.tipannesu. ^b^saggagato^eb^ti uppajjanavasena sagga.m gato, tatthaapi ^b^tidive^eb^ taavati.msabhavane ^b^anubhoti ca pu~n~naphala.m vipula.m^eb^ yathaaha.m, eva.m a~n~nopiiti attho.

[03] 1066^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa catunna.m phalaana.m daanamattena iidisii sampatti ^a^P0.0291^ea^ adhigataa, tasmaa. ^b^alameva^eb^ yuttameva. ^b^nicca^eb^nti sabbakaala.m. ^b^dibbaanii^eb^ti devalokapariyaapannaani. ^b^manussasobhaggata^eb^nti manussesu subhagabhaava.m. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^cando yathaa vigatavalaahake nabhe^eb^ti upassayadaayakavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. tena samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gaamakaavaase vassa.m vasitvaa vutthavasso pavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m vanditu.m raajagaha.m gacchanto antaraamagge saaya.m a~n~natara.m gaama.m pavisitvaa vasana.t.thaana.m pariyesanto a~n~natara.m upaasaka.m disvaa pucchi -- ``upaasaka, imasmi.m gaame atthi ki~nci pabbajitaana.m vasanayogga.t.thaana''nti. upaasako pasannacitto geha.m gantvaa bhariyaaya saddhi.m mantetvaa therassa ^a^M0.0271^ea^ vasanayogga.m .thaana.m paricchinditvaa tattha aasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m upa.t.thapetvaa thera.m pavesetvaa tasmi.m paade dhovante padiipa.m ujjaaletvaa ma~nce paccatthara.naani pa~n~naapetvaa adaasi. svaatanaaya ca nimantetvaa therassa dutiyadivase bhojetvaa paanakatthaaya gu.lapi.n.da~nca datvaa thera.m gacchanta.m anugantvaa nivatti. so aparena samayena saha bhariyaaya kaala.m katvaa taavati.msabhavane dvaadasayojanike kanakavimaane nibbatti. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano dviihi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi --
[21] ``cando yathaa vigatavalaahake nabhe, obhaasaya.m gacchati antalikkhe.
[22] tathuupama.m tuyhamida.m vimaana.m, obhaasaya.m ti.t.thati antalikkhe..
[22] kenaasi eva.m jalitaanubhaavo, va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti..
[21] ``aha~nca bhariyaa ca manussaloke, upassaya.m arahato adamha.
[22] anna~nca paana~nca pasannacittaa, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adamha..
[21] ``tena metaadiso va.n.no...pe0... va.n.no ca me sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti..
[22] tattha gaathaasu ya.m vattabba.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^suuriyo^eb^ ^a^M0.0272^ea^ ^b^yathaa vigatavalaahake nabhe^eb^ti dutiyaupassayadaayakavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. tena samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu gaamakaavaase vassa.m vasitvaa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya raajagaha.m uddissa gacchantaa saaya.m a~n~natara.m gaama.m sampaapu.ni.msu. sesa.m anantaravimaanasadisameva.

[03] ^b^uccamida.m ma.nithuu.na.m vimaana^eb^nti bhikkhaadaayakavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. tena samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu addhaanamaggapa.tipanno a~n~natara.m gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho ekassa gharaddhaare a.t.thaasi. tattha a~n~nataro puriso dhotahatthapaado ``bhu~njissaamii''ti ^a^V0.0246^ea^ nisinno bhojana.m upanetvaa paatiyaa pakkhitte ta.m bhikkhu.m disvaa paatiyaa bhatta.m tassa bhikkhuno patte aakiranto tena ``ekadesameva dehii''ti vuttopi sabbameva aakiri. so bhikkhu anumodana.m ^a^P0.0293^ea^ vatvaa pakkaami. so puriso ``chaatajjhattassa bhikkhuno mayaa abhu~njitvaa bhatta.m dinna''nti anussaranto u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tilabhi. so aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu dvaadasayojanike kanakavimaane nibbatti. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaanatthero devacaarika.m caranto mahatiyaa deviddhiyaa virocamaana.m disvaa imaahi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi --
[22] kuu.taagaaraa sattasataa u.laaraa, ve.luriyathambhaa rucakatthataa subhaa..
[21] ``aha.m manussesu manussabhuuto, disvaana bhikkhu.m tasita.m kilanta.m.
[22] ekaaha.m bhikkha.m pa.tipaadayissa.m, sama"ngi bhattena tadaa akaasi.m..
[21] ``tena metaadiso va.n.no...pe0... va.n.no ca me sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti..

[03] 1084^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ekaaha.m bhikkha^eb^nti eka.m aha.m bhikkhaamatta.m, eka.m bhattava.d.dhitakanti attho. ^b^pa.tipaadayissa^eb^nti pa.tipaadesi.m adaasi.m. ^b^sama"ngi bhattenaa^eb^ti bhattena sama"ngiibhuuta.m, laddhabhikkhanti attho. eva.m mahaathero tena devaputtena attano sucaritakamme pakaasite saparivaarassa tassa dhamma.m desetvaa manussalokamaagato, ta.m pavatti.m sammaasambuddhassa kathesi. satthaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa sampattamahaajanassa dhamma.m desesi. saa desanaa mahaajanassa saatthikaa ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^uccamida.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0274^ea^ ^a^P0.0294^ea^ ^a^V0.0247^ea^ ^b^ma.nithuu.na.m vimaana^eb^nti yavapaalakavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. tena samayena raajagahe a~n~nataro duggatadaarako yavakhetta.m rakkhati. so ekadivasa.m paataraasatthaaya kummaasa.m labhitvaa ``khetta.m gantvaa bhu~njissaamii''ti ta.m kummaasa.m gahetvaa yavakhetta.m gantvaa rukkhamuule nisiidi. tasmi.m kha.ne a~n~nataro khii.naasavatthero maggappa.tipanno upaka.t.the kaale ta.m .thaana.m patvaa yavapaalakena nisinna.m rukkhamuula.m upasa"nkami. yavapaalako vela.m oloketvaa ``kacci, bhante, aahaaro laddho''ti aaha. thero tu.nhii ahosi. so aladdhabhaava.m ~natvaa ``bhante, upaka.t.thaa velaa, pi.n.daaya caritvaa bhu~njitu.m na sakkaa, mayha.m anukampaaya ima.m kummaasa.m paribhu~njathaa''ti vatvaa therassa ta.m kummaasa.m adaasi. thero ta.m anukampanto tassa passantasseva ta.m paribhu~njitvaa anumodana.m vatvaa pakkaami. sopi daarako ``sudinna.m vata mayaa iidisassa kummaasadaana.m dadantenaa''ti citta.m pasaadetvaa aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.msabhavane vuttanayeneva vimaane nibbatti. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaanatthero imaahi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi --

[03] ^b^ala"nkato^eb^ ^a^P0.0295^ea^ ^b^malyadharo suvattho^eb^ti ku.n.daliivimaana.m. tassa kaa upatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena samayena dve aggasaavakaa saparivaaraa kaasiisu caarika.m carantaa suuriyattha"ngamanavelaaya.m a~n~natara.m vihaara.m paapu.ni.msu. ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa tassa vihaarassa gocaragaame a~n~nataro upaasako there upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa paadadhovana.m paadabbha~njanatela.m ma~ncapii.tha.m paccatthara.na.m padiipiya~nca upanetvaa svaatanaaya ca nimantetvaa dutiyadivase mahaadaana.m pavattesi, theraa tassa anumodana.m vatvaa pakkami.msu. so aparena samayena kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu dvaadasayojanike kanakavimaane nibbatti. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaanatthero imaahi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi --
[22] aamuttahatthaabhara.no yasassii, dibbe vimaanamhi yathaapi candimaa..
[21] ``dibbaa ca vii.naa pavadanti vaggu.m, a.t.tha.t.thakaa sikkhitaa saadhuruupaa.
[22] dibbaa ca ka~n~naa tidasacaraa u.laaraa, naccanti gaayanti pamodayanti..
[22] anna~nca ^a^P0.0296^ea^ paana~nca pasannacitto, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adaasi.m..

[03] 1094^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^suku.n.dalii^eb^ti sundarehi ku.n.dalehi ala"nkataka.n.no. ``saku.n.dalii''tipi paa.tho, sadisa.m ku.n.dala.m saku.n.dala.m, ta.m assa atthiiti saku.n.dalii, yuttaku.n.dalii a~n~nama~n~na~nca tuyha~nca anucchavikaku.n.daliiti attho. ^b^kappitakesamassuu^eb^ti sammaakappitakesamassu. ^b^aamuttahatthaabhara.no^eb^ti pa.timukkaa"nguliyaadihatthaabhara.no.
[03] 1098^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta.nhakkhayuupapanne^eb^ti ta.nhakkhaya.m arahatta.m, nibbaanameva vaa upagate, adhigatavanteti attho. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ala"nkato malyadharo suvattho^eb^ti dutiyaku.n.daliivimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena samayena dve aggasaavakaa kaasiisu janapadacaarika.m carantaatiaadi sabba.m anantarasadisameva.
[22] aamuttahatthaabhara.no yasassii, dibbe vimaanamhi yathaapi candimaa..
[22] dibbaa ca ka~n~naa tidasacaraa u.laaraa, naccanti gaayanti pamodayanti..
[22] va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti.. -- pucchi.
[22] anna~nca paana~nca pasannacitto, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adaasi.m..

[03] ^b^yaa devaraajassa sabhaa sudhammaa^eb^ti uttaravimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavati parinibbute dhaatuvibhaage ca kate tattha tattha thuupesu pati.t.thaapiyamaanesu dhammavinaya.m sa"ngaayitu.m uccinitvaa gahitesu mahaakassapappamukhesu mahaatheresu yaava vassuupagamanaa a~n~nesu ca theresu attano attano parisaaya saddhi.m tattha tattha vasantesu aayasmaa kumaarakassapo pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m setabyanagara.m gantvaa si.msapaavane vasi. atha paayaasi raaja~n~no therassa tattha vasanabhaava.m sutvaa mahataa janakaayena ^a^M0.0278^ea^ parivuto ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa nisinno attano di.t.thigata.m pavedesi. atha na.m thero candimasuuriyuudaahara.naadiihi paralokassa atthibhaava.m pakaasento anekavihitahetuupamaala"nkata.m di.t.thiga.n.thivinive.thana.m naanaanayavicitta.m paayaasisutta.m (dii0 ni0 2.406 aadayo) desetvaa ta.m di.t.thisampadaaya.m pati.t.thaapesi.

[03] so visuddhadi.t.thiko hutvaa sama.nabraahma.nakapa.naddhikaadiina.m daana.m dento anu.laarajjhaasayataaya ^a^P0.0298^ea^ luukha.m adaasi ghaasacchaadanamatta.m ka.naajaka.m bila"ngadutiya.m saa.naani ca vatthaani ^a^V0.0251^ea^. eva.m pana asakkaccadaana.m datvaa kaayassa bhedaa hiinakaaya.m upapajji caatumahaaraajikaana.m sahabyata.m. tassa pana kiccaakiccesu yuttappayutto uttaro naama maa.navo ahosi daane byaava.to. so sakkaccadaana.m datvaa taavati.msakaaya.m upapanno, tassa dvaadasayojanika.m vimaana.m nibbatti. so kata~n~nuta.m vibhaavento saha vimaanena kumaarakassapatthera.m upasa"nkamitvaa vimaanato oruyha pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. ta.m thero --
[21] ``yaa devaraajassa sabhaa sudhammaa, yatthacchati devasa"ngho samaggo.
[22] tathuupama.m tuyhamida.m vimaana.m, obhaasaya.m ti.t.thati antalikkhe..
[22] va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti.. -- gaathaahi pa.tipucchi.
[21] ``aha.m manussesu manussabhuuto, ra~n~no paayaasissa ahosi.m maa.navo.
[27] laddhaa dhana.m sa.mvibhaaga.m akaasi.m, piyaa ca me siilavanto ahesu.m.
[22] anna~nca paana~nca pasannacitto, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adaasi.m..
[25] so devaputto tassa imaahi gaathaahi byaakaasi.

[03] 1108^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^devaraajassaa^eb^ti sakkassa. ^b^sabhaa sudhammaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamaka.m santhaagaara.m. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yassa.m sabhaaya.m. ^b^acchatii^eb^ti nisiidati. ^b^devasa"ngho^eb^ti taavati.msadevakaayo. ^b^samaggo^eb^ti sahito sannipatito.

[03] 1111^b^.^eb^ ^b^paayaasissa^eb^ ^a^P0.0299^ea^ ^b^ahosi.m maa.navo^eb^ti paayaasiraaja~n~nassa kiccaakiccakaro daharataaya maa.navo, naamena pana uttaro naama ahosi.m. ^b^sa.mvibhaaga.m akaasi^eb^nti ahameva abhu~njitvaa ^a^V0.0252^ea^ yathaaladdha.m dhana.m daanamukhe pariccajanavasena sa.mvibhajana.m akaasi.m. anna~nca paana~nca pariccajantoti vacanaseso. atha vaa daana.m vipula.m adaasi.m. katha.m? ^b^sakkacca.m^eb^. kiidisa.m? ^b^anna~nca paana~ncaa^eb^ti yojetabba.m.

[03] ^b^yathaa^eb^ ^a^V0.0253^ea^ ^b^vana.m cittalata.m pabhaasatii^eb^ti cittalataavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena samayena saavatthiya.m a~n~nataro upaasako daliddo appabhogo paresa.m kamma.m katvaa jiivati. so saddho pasanno ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe maataapitaro posento ``itthiyo naama patikule .thitaa issariya.m karonti, sassusasuraana.m manaapacaariniyo dullabhaa''ti maataapituuna.m cittadukkha.m pariharanto daarapariggaha.m akatvaa sayameva ne upa.t.thahati, siilaani rakkhati, uposatha.m upavasati ^a^M0.0280^ea^, yathaavibhava.m daanaani deti. so aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu dvaadasayojanike vimaane nibbatti. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano he.t.thaa vuttanayena gantvaa katakamma.m imaahi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi --
[22] tathuupama.m tuyhamida.m vimaana.m, obhaasaya.m ti.t.thati antalikkhe..
[21] ``aha.m manussesu manussabhuuto, daliddo ataa.no kapa.no kammakaro ahosi.m.
[27] ji.n.ne ca maataapitaro abhaari.m, piyaa ca me siilavanto ahesu.m.
[22] anna~nca paana~nca pasannacitto, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adaasi.m..
[21] ``tena metaadiso va.n.no...pe0...va.n.no ca me sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti.. --

[03] ^b^yathaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0281^ea^ ^b^vana.m nandana.m pabhaasatii^eb^ti nandanavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena samayena saavatthiya.m a~n~nataro upaasakotiaadi sabba.m anantaravimaanasadisa.m. aya.m pana daarapariggaha.m katvaa maataapitaro posesiiti ayameva viseso.
[21] yathaa vana.m nandana.m pabhaasati, uyyaanase.t.tha.m tidasaanamuttama.m.
[22] tathuupama.m tuyhamida.m vimaana.m, obhaasaya.m ti.t.thati antalikkhe..
[21] ``aha.m manussesu manussabhuuto, daliddo ataa.no kapa.no kammakaro ahosi.m.
[27] ji.n.ne ca maataapitaro abhaari.m, piyaa ca me siilavanto ahesu.m.
[22] anna~nca ^a^P0.0301^ea^ paana~nca pasannacitto, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adaasi.m..
[21] ``tena metaadiso va.n.no...pe0...va.n.no ca me sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti.. --
[25] gaathaahi byaakaasi. tattha gaathaasupi apubba.m natthi.

[03] ^b^uccamida.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0282^ea^ ^b^ma.nithuu.na.m vimaana^eb^nti ma.nithuu.navimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena samayena sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu ara~n~naayatane viharanti. tesa.m gaama.m pi.n.daaya ^a^V0.0255^ea^ gamanamagge eko upaasako visama.m sama.m karoti, ka.n.take niiharati, gacchagumbe apaneti, udakakaale maatikaasu setu.m bandhati, vivana.t.thaanesu chaayaarukkhe ropeti, jalaasayesu mattika.m uddharitvaa te puthulagambhiire karoti, titthe sampaadeti, yathaavibhava.m daana.m deti, siila.m rakkhati. so aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu dvaadasayojanike kanakavimaane nibbatti. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaanatthero upasa"nkamitvaa imaahi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi --
[22] kuu.taagaaraa sattasataa u.laaraa, ve.luriyathambhaa rucakatthataa subhaa..
[21] ``tatthacchasi pivasi khaadasi ca, dibbaa ca vii.naa pavadanti vaggu.m.
[22] dibbaa rasaa kaamagu.nettha pa~nca, naariyo ca naccanti suva.n.nacchannaa..
[21] ``kena tetaadiso va.n.no...pe0...va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti..
[21] ``aha.m ^a^P0.0302^ea^ manussesu manussabhuuto, vivane pathe sa"nkamana.m akaasi.m.
[21] aaraamarukkhaani ca ropayissa.m, piyaa ca me siilavanto ahesu.m.
[22] anna~nca paana~nca pasannacitto, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adaasi.m..
[21] ``tena ^a^M0.0283^ea^ metaadiso va.n.no...pe0...va.n.no ca me sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti..
[03] 1131^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^vivane^eb^ti ara~n~ne. ^b^aaraamarukkhaani caa^eb^ aaraamabhuute rukkhe, aaraama.m katvaa tattha rukkhe ropesinti attho. sesa.m sabba.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^sova.n.namaye^eb^ ^a^V0.0256^ea^ ^b^pabbatasmi^eb^nti suva.n.navimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa andhakavinde viharati. tena samayena a~n~nataro upaasako saddho pasanno vibhavasampanno tassa gaamassa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m mu.n.dakapabbate sabbaakaarasampanna.m bhagavato vasanaanucchavika.m gandhaku.ti.m kaaretvaa tattha bhagavanta.m vasaapento sakkacca.m upa.t.thahi, saya~nca niccasiile pati.t.thito suvisuddhasiilasa.mvaro hutvaa kaala.m katvaa taavati.msabhavane nibbatti. tassa kammaanubhaavasa.msuucaka.m naanaaratanara.msijaalasamujjala.m vicittavedikaaparikkhitta.m vividhavipulaala"nkaaropasobhita.m suvibhattabhittitthambhasopaana.m aaraamarama.niiyaka.m ka~ncanapabbatamuddhani vimaana.m uppajji. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano devacaarika.m caranto disvaa imaahi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi --
[21] ``daanassa te ida.m phala.m, atho siilassa vaa pana.
[22] atho a~njalikammassa, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito''ti..
[22] vihaara.m satthu kaaresi.m, pasanno sehi paa.nibhi..
[22] tena mayha.m ida.m laddha.m, vasa.m vattemi nandane..

[03] 1135^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbe ve.luriyaamayaa^eb^ti sabbe thambhaa ve.luriyama.nimayaa. tattha pana ^b^ekamekaaya a.msiyaa^eb^ti a.t.tha.msesu thambhesu ekamekasmi.m a.msabhaage. ^b^ratanaa satta nimmitaa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0304^ea^ sattaratanakammanimmitaa, ekeko a.mso sattaratanamayoti attho.

[03] 1136^b^.^eb^ ^b^``ve.luuriyasuva.n.nassaa''^eb^tiaadinaa naanaaratanaani dasseti. tattha ^b^ve.luuriyasuva.n.nassaa^eb^ti ve.luriyena ca suva.n.nena ca nimmitaa, citraati ^a^M0.0285^ea^ vaa yojanaa. kara.natthe hi ^a^V0.0258^ea^ ida.m saamivacana.m. ^b^phalikaa ruupiyassa caa^eb^ti etthaapi eseva nayo. ^b^masaaragallamuttaahii^eb^ti kabarama.niihi. ^b^lohita"ngama.niihi caa^eb^ti rattama.niihi.

[03] 1137^b^.^eb^ ^b^na tatthuddha.msatii rajo^eb^ti ma.nimayabhuumikattaa na tasmi.m vimaane rajo uggacchati. ^b^gopaanasiiga.naa^eb^ti gopaanasiisamuuhaa. ^b^piitaa^eb^ti piitava.n.naa, suva.n.namayaa ceva phussaraagaadima.nimayaa caati attho. ^b^kuu.ta.m dhaarentii^eb^ti sattaratanamaya.m ka.n.nika.m dhaarenti.
[03] 1138-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^naanaaratanagabbhehii^eb^ti naanaaratanamayehi ovarakehi. ^b^vediyaa^eb^ti vedikaa. ^b^catasso^eb^ti catuusu disaasu catasso. tenaaha ^b^``samantaa caturo disaa''^eb^ti.

[03] 1143^b^.^eb^ ^b^sehi paa.nibhii^eb^ti kaayasaara.m pu~n~na.m pasavanto attano paa.niihi ta.m ta.m kicca.m karonto vihaara.m satthu kaaresinti yojanaa. atha vaa ^b^sehi paa.nibhii^eb^ti tattha andhakavindasmi.m gandha~nca maala~nca paccaya~nca vilepana~nca puujaavasena. yathaa katha.m? vihaara~nca vippasannena cetasaa satthuno adaasi.m puujesi.m niyyaadesi.m caati evamettha yojanaa veditabbaa.

[03] 1144^b^.^eb^ ^b^tenaa^eb^ti tena yathaavuttena pu~n~nakammena kaara.nabhuutena. ^b^mayha^eb^nti mayaa. ^b^ida^eb^nti ida.m pu~n~naphala.m, ida.m vaa dibba.m aadhipateyya.m. tenaaha ^b^``vasa.m vattemii''^eb^ti.

[03] 1145^b^.^eb^ ^b^nandane^eb^ti nandiyaa dibbasamiddhiyaa uppajjana.t.thaane ^a^P0.0305^ea^ imasmi.m devaloke, tatthaapi visesato nandane vane ramme, eva.m rama.niiye imasmi.m nandane vane ramaamiiti yojanaa. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] eva.m devataaya attano pu~n~nakamme aavikate thero saparivaarassa tassa devaputtassa dhamma.m desetvaa bhagavato tamattha.m nivedesi. bhagavaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa sampattaparisaaya dhamma.m desesi. saa desanaa mahaajanassa saatthikaa ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^uccamida.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0286^ea^ ^a^V0.0259^ea^ ^b^ma.nithuu.na^eb^nti ambavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. tena samayena raajagahe a~n~nataro duggatapuriso paresa.m bhattavetanabhato hutvaa ambavana.m rakkhati. so ekadivasa.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m gimhasamaye suuriyaatapasantatte u.nhavaalikaanippii.lite vipphandamaanamariicijaalavitthate bhuumippadese tassa ambaaraamassa aviduurena maggena sedaagatena gattena gacchanta.m disvaa sa~njaatagaaravabahumaano upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha ``mahaa aya.m, bhante, ghammapari.laaho, ativiya parissantaruupo viya dissati, saadhu, bhante, ayyo ima.m ambaaraama.m pavisitvaa muhutta.m vissamitvaa addhaanaparissama.m pa.tivinodetvaa gacchatha anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. thero visesato tassa cittappasaada.m paribruuhetukaamo ta.m aaraama.m pavisitvaa a~n~natarassa ambarukkhassa muule nisiidi.

[03] puna so puriso aaha ``sace, bhante, nhaayitukaamattha, aha.m ito kuupato udaka.m uddharitvaa tumhe nhaapessaami, paaniiya~nca dassaamii''ti. theropi adhivaasesi tu.nhiibhaavena. so kuupato udaka.m uddharitvaa parissaavetvaa thera.m nhaapesi, nhaapetvaa ca hatthapaade dhovitvaa nisinnassa paaniiya.m upanesi. thero paaniiya.m pivitvaa pa.tippassaddhadaratho tassa purisassa udakadaane ceva nhaapane ca anumodana.m ^a^P0.0306^ea^ vatvaa pakkaami. atha so puriso ``ghammaabhitattassa vata therassa ghammapari.laaha.m pa.tippassambhesi.m, bahu.m vata mayaa pu~n~na.m pasuta''nti u.laarapiitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedesi. so aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu uppajji. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano upasa"nkamitvaa imaahi gaathaahi katapu~n~na.m pucchi.
[22] kuu.taagaaraa sattasataa u.laaraa, ve.luriyathambhaa rucakatthataa subhaa..
[21] ``tatthacchasi ^a^M0.0287^ea^ pivasi khaadasi ca, dibbaa ca vii.naa pavadanti vaggu.m.
[22] dibbaa rasaa kaamagu.nettha pa~nca, naariyo ca naccanti suva.n.nachannaa..
[22] saadhu ta.m bhante nhaapeyya.m, ya.m mamassa sukhaavaha.m..
[22] iti so piitiyaa kaaya.m, sabba.m pharati attano..

[03] 1151^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0261^ea^ ^b^gimhaana.m pacchime maase^eb^ti aasaa.lhimaase. ^b^patapante^eb^ti ativiya dippante, sabbaso u.nha.m vissajjenteti attho. ^b^diva"nkare^eb^ti divaakare, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ^b^asi~ncatii^eb^ti si~ncati, -kaaro nipaatamatta.m, si~ncati ambarukkhamuulesu dhuva.m jalaseka.m karotiiti attho. ``asi~ncathaa''ti ca paa.tho, si~ncitthaati attho. ``asi~ncaha''nti ca pa.thanti, paresa.m bhatako poso hutvaa tadaa ambaaraama.m asi~nci.m ahanti attho.

[03] 1152^b^.^eb^ ^b^tenaa^eb^ti yena disaabhaagena so ambaaraamo, tena agamaa aga~nchi. ^b^akilantova cetasaa^eb^ti cetodukkhassa maggeneva pahiinattaa cetasaa akilantopi samaano kilanturuupo kaayena tena maggena agamaati yojanaa.
[03] 1153-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^avoca.m^eb^ aha.m tadaa ^b^ambasi~ncako^eb^ hutvaati yojanaa. ^b^ekaciivaro^eb^ti nhaayitukaamoti adhippaayo.

[03] 1156^b^.^eb^ ^b^itii^eb^ti eva.m ``ambo ca sitto, sama.no ca nhaapito, mayaa ca pu~n~na.m pasuta.m anappaka.m, ekeneva payogena tividhopi attho saadhito''ti iminaakaarena pavattaaya ^b^piitiyaa so^eb^ puriso ^b^attano sabba.m kaaya.m pharati,^eb^ nirantara.m phu.ta.m karotiiti yojanaa. atiitatthe ceta.m vattamaanavacana.m, phariiti attho.

[03] 1157^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadeva ettaka.m kamma^eb^nti ta.m ettaka.m eva.m paaniiyadaanamattaka.m ^a^P0.0308^ea^ kamma.m akaasi.m, taaya tassa.m jaatiya.m a~n~na.m naanussaraamiiti adhippaayo. tesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^disvaana^eb^ ^a^M0.0289^ea^ ^b^deva.m pa.tipucchi bhikkhuu^eb^ti gopaalavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. tena samayena raajagahavaasii a~n~nataro gopaalako paataraasatthaaya pilotikaaya pu.tabaddha.m kummaasa.m gahetvaa nagarato nikkhamitvaa gaaviina.m cara.na.t.thaanabhuuta.m gocarabhuumi.m sampaapu.ni. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ``aya.m idaaneva kaala.m karissati, mayha~nca kummaasa.m datvaa taavati.msesu uppajjissatii''ti ca ~natvaa tassa samiipa.m agamaasi. so ^a^V0.0262^ea^ vela.m oloketvaa therassa kummaasa.m daatukaamo ahosi. tena ca samayena gaaviyo maasakkhetta.m pavisanti. atha so gopaalo cintesi ``ki.m nu kho therassa kummaasa.m dadeyya.m, udaahu gaaviyo maasakkhettato niihareyya''nti. athassa etadahosi ``maasasaamikaa ma.m ya.m icchanti, ta.m karontu, there pana gate kummaasadaanantaraayo me siyaa, handaaha.m pa.thama.m ayyassa kummaasa.m dassaamii''ti ta.m therassa upanesi. pa.tiggahesi thero anukampa.m upaadaaya.

[03] atha na.m gaaviyo nivattetu.m parissaya.m anoloketvaa vegena upadhaavanta.m paadena phu.t.tho aasiiviso .da.msi. theropi ta.m anukampamaano ta.m kummaasa.m paribhu~njitu.m aarabhi. gopaalakopi gaaviyo nivattetvaa aagato thera.m kummaasa.m paribhu~njanta.m disvaa pasannacitto u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedento nisiidi. taavadevassa sakalasariira.m visa.m ajjhotthari. muhuttameva vege muddhapatte kaalamakaasi, kaalakato ca taavati.msesu dvaadasayojanike kanakavimaane nibbatti. ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano disvaa imaahi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi --
[21] ``disvaana deva.m pa.tipucchi bhikkhu, ucce vimaanamhi cira.t.thitike.
[22] aamuttahatthaabhara.na.m ^a^P0.0309^ea^ yasassi.m, dibbe vimaanamhi yathaapi candimaa..
[22] aamuttahatthaabhara.no yasassii, dibbe vimaanamhi yathaapi candimaa..
[21] ``dibbaa ca vii.naa pavadanti vaggu.m. a.t.tha.t.thakaa sikkhitaa saadhuruupaa.
[22] dibbaa ca ka~n~naa tidasacaraa u.laaraa, naccanti gaayanti pamodayanti..
[21] ``aha.m ^a^V0.0263^ea^ manussesu manussabhuuto, sa"ngamma rakkhissa.m paresa.m dhenuyo.
[22] tato ca aagaa sama.no mamantike, gaavo ca maase agama.msu khaaditu.m..
[21] ``dvayajja kicca.m ubhaya~nca kaariya.m, iccevaha.m bhante tadaa vicintayi.m.
[22] tato ca sa~n~na.m pa.tiladdha yoniso, `dadaami bhante'ti khipi.m anantaka.m..
[21] ``so maasakhetta.m turito avaasari.m, puraa aya.m bha~njati yassida.m dhana.m.
[22] tato ca ka.nho urago mahaaviso, a.da.msi paade turitassa me sato..
[21] ``svaaha.m a.t.tomhi dukkhena pii.lito, bhikkhu ca ta.m saama.m mu~ncitvaanantaka.m.
[22] ahaasi kummaasa.m mamaanukampayaa, tato cuto kaalakatomhi devataa..
[21] ``tadeva ^a^M0.0291^ea^ ^a^P0.0310^ea^ kamma.m kusala.m kata.m mayaa, sukha~nca kamma.m anubhomi attanaa.
[22] tayaa hi bhante anukampito bhusa.m, kata~n~nutaaya abhivaadayaami ta.m..
[21] ``sadevake loke samaarake ca, a~n~no muni natthi tayaanukampako.
[22] tayaa hi bhante anukampito bhusa.m, kata~n~nutaaya abhivaadayaami ta.m..
[21] ``imasmi.m loke parasmi.m vaa pana, a~n~no munii natthi tayaanukampako.
[22] tayaa hi bhante anukampito bhusa.m, kata~n~nutaaya abhivaadayaami ta''nti..

[03] athaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano attanaa ca devataaya ca kathitaniyaameneva ta.m bhagavato aarocesi. satthaa tamattha.m paccanubhaasitvaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa sampattaparisaaya dhamma.m desetu.m ^b^``disvaana deva.m pa.tipucchi bhikkhuu''^eb^tiaadimaaha.

[03] 1159^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^deva^eb^nti gopaaladevaputta.m. ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m sandhaaya satthaa vadati. so hi sabbaso bhinnakilesataaya bhikkhu. vimaanassa bahukaalaava.t.thaayitaaya kappa.t.thitikataaya eva vaa ^b^``cira.t.thitike''^eb^ti vutta.m, ``cira.t.thitika''ntipi keci pa.thanti. ta~nhi ``deva''nti iminaa sambandhitabba.m. sopi hi sa.t.thisatasahassaadhikaa tisso vassako.tiyo tattha ava.t.thaanato ``cira.t.thitike''ti vattabbata.m labhati. ^b^yathaapi candimaa^eb^ti yathaa candimaa devaputto kantasiitalamanoharakira.najaalasamujjale ^a^V0.0264^ea^ attano dibbe vimaanamhi virocati, eva.m virocamaananti vacanasesaa.
[03] 1160^b^.^eb^ ^b^ala"nkato^eb^tiaadi tassa devaputtassa therena pucchitaakaaradassana.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttatthameva.

[03] 1164^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa"ngammaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0292^ea^ sa"ngametvaa, ^b^sa"ngammaa^eb^ti vaa sa"ngahetvaa. hetvatthopi hi idha antoniito, bahuu ekato hutvaati attho. ^b^aagaa^eb^ti aaga~nchi. ^b^maase^eb^ti maasasassaani.

[03] 1165^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvayajjaa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0311^ea^ dvaya.m ajja etarahi ^b^kicca.m^eb^ kaatabba.m. ^b^ubhaya~nca kaariya^eb^nti vuttassevatthassa pariyaayavacana.m. ^b^sa~n~na^eb^nti dhammasa~n~na.m. tenaaha ``yoniso''ti ^b^pa.tiladdhaa^eb^ti pa.tilabhitvaa. ^b^khipi^eb^nti paniggaahaapanavasena hatthe khipi.m. ^b^anantaka^eb^nti nantaka.m kummaasa.m pakkhipitvaa bandhitvaa .thapita.m pilotika.m. a-kaaro cettha nipaatamatta.m.

[03] 1166^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ti so aha.m. ^b^turito^eb^ti turito sambhamanto. ^b^avaasari^eb^nti upagacchi, paavisi.m vaa. ^b^puraa aya.m bha~njati yassida.m dhana^eb^nti yassa khettasaamikassa ida.m maasasassa.m dhana.m, ta.m aya.m goga.no bha~njati puraa tassa bha~njanato, aamaddanato puretaramevaati attho. ^b^tato^eb^ti tattha. ^b^turitassa me sato^eb^ti sambhamantassa me samaanassa, sahasaa gamanena magge ka.nhasappa.m anoloketvaa gatassaati adhippaayo.

[03] 1167^b^.^eb^ ^b^a.t.tomhi dukkhena pii.lito^eb^ti tena aasiivisa.da.msanena a.t.to a.t.tito upadduto mara.nadukkhena baadhito bhavaami. ^b^ahaasii^eb^ti ajjhohari, paribhu~njiiti attho. ^b^tato cuto kaalakatomhi devataa^eb^ti tato manussattabhaavato cuto mara.nakaalappattiyaa, tattha vaa aayusa"nkhaarassa khepanasa"nkhaatassa kaalassa katattaa kaalakato, tadanantarameva ca amhi devataa devattabhaavappattiyaa devataa homiiti attho.
[03] 1169^b^.^eb^ ^b^tayaa^eb^ti tayaa sadiso ^b^a~n~no muni^eb^ moneyyagu.nayutto isi natthi. ^b^tayaa^eb^ti vaa nissakke ida.m kara.navacana.m. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^pu.n.namaase^eb^ ^a^M0.0293^ea^ ^a^V0.0265^ea^ ^b^yathaa cando^eb^ti ka.n.dakavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa ^a^P0.0312^ea^ saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena ca samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva devacaarika.m caranto taavati.msabhavana.m gato. tasmi.m kha.ne ka.n.dako devaputto sakabhavanato nikkhamitvaa dibbayaana.m abhiruhitvaa mahantena parivaarena mahatiyaa deviddhiyaa uyyaana.m gacchanto aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m disvaa sa~njaatagaaravabahumaano sahasaa yaanato oruyha thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa sirasmi.m a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. atha na.m thero --
[22] kuu.taagaaraa subhaa rammaa, paasaado te sumaapito..
[21] ``dibbaa te vividhaa ruupaa, dibbaa saddaa atho rasaa.
[22] gandhaa ca te adhippetaa, pho.t.thabbaa ca manoramaa..
[21] ``daanassa te ida.m phala.m, atho siilassa vaa pana.
[22] atho a~njalikammassa, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito''ti.. --
[22] pa~nha.m pu.t.tho viyaakaasi, yassa kammassida.m phala.m''..
[22] so ma.m muduuhi paa.niihi, jaalitambanakhehi ca..
[21] ``ta.m me gira.m su.nantassa, haaso me vipulo ahu.
[22] mama.m channa~nca ohaaya, anapekkho so apakkami..
[22] alattha.m garukaabaadha.m, khippa.m me mara.na.m ahu..
[21] ``ya~nca me ahuvaa haaso, sadda.m sutvaana bodhiyaa.
[21] ``sace ^a^P0.0314^ea^ hi bhante gaccheyyaasi, satthu buddhassa santike.
[22] mamaapi na.m vacanena, sirasaa vajjaasi vandana.m..

[25] sopi ^a^V0.0268^ea^ attanaa katakamma.m kathesi. aya~nhi anantare attabhaave amhaaka.m bodhisattena sahajaato ka.n.dako assaraajaa ahosi. so abhinikkhamanasamaye abhiru.lho teneva rattaavasesena tii.ni rajjaani mahaapurisa.m atikkamaapetvaa anomaanadiitiira.m sampaapesi. atha so mahaasattena suuriye uggate gha.tikaaramahaabrahmunaa upaniitaani pattaciivaraani gahetvaa pabbajitvaa channena saddhi.m kapilavatthu.m uddissa vissajjito. sinehabhaarikena hadayena mahaapurisassa paade attano jivhaaya lehitvaa pasaadasommaani akkhiini ummiiletvaa yaava dassanapathaa olokento dassanuupacaara.m pana atikkante lokanaathe ``eva.mvidha.m naama lokagganaayaka.m mahaapurisa.m aha.m vahi.m, saphala.m vata me sariira.m ahosii''ti pasannamaanaso hutvaa puna cirakaala.m sa"ngatassa pemassa vasena viyogadukkha.m asahanto bhaaviniyaa dibbasampattiyaa vasena ^a^M0.0296^ea^ dhammataaya codiyamaano kaala.m katvaa taavati.msabhavane nibbatti. ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m ^b^``pu.n.namaase yathaa cando...pe0... aha.m kapilavatthusmi''^eb^ntiaadi.

[03] 1171^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^pu.n.namaase^eb^ti pu.n.namaasiya.m sukkapakkhe pannarasiya.m. ^b^taarakaadhipatii^eb^ti taarakaana.m adhipati. ^b^sasii^eb^ti sasala~nchanavaa. ``taarakaadhipa dissatii''ti keci pa.thanti, tesa.m taarakaadhipaati avibhattikaniddeso, taarakaana.m adhipo hutvaa dissati anupariyaati caati yojanaa kaatabbaa.

[03] 1172^b^.^eb^ ^b^dibba.m devapuramhi caa^eb^ti devapurasmimpi dibba.m. yathaa manussaana.m .thaanato devapura.m uttama.m, eva.m devapurato caapi ida.m tava vimaana.m uttamanti dasseti. tenaaha ^b^``atirocati va.n.nena, udayantova ra.msimaa''^eb^ti, uggacchanto suuriyo viyaati attho.
[03] 1173^b^.^eb^ ^b^ve.luuriyasuva.n.nassaa^eb^ti ve.luriyena suva.n.nena ca ida.m byamha.m ^a^P0.0315^ea^ nimmitanti vacanasesena yojanaa. ^b^phalikaa^eb^ti phalikama.ninaa.

[03] 1177-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassaa^eb^ti tassaa pokkhara.niyaa. ^b^vanagumbaa^eb^ti uyyaane supupphagacche sandhaaya vadati. ^b^devaraaja.mvaa^eb^ti sakka.m viya. ^b^upati.t.thantii^eb^ti upa.t.thaana.m karonti.
[03] 1179^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbaabhara.nasa~nchannaa^eb^ti ^a^V0.0269^ea^ sabbehi itthaala"nkaarehi pa.ticchaaditaa, sabbaso vibhuusitasariiraati attho. ^b^vasavattiivaa^eb^ti vasavattidevaraajaa viya.

[03] 1180^b^.^eb^ ^b^bherisa"nkhamudi"ngaahii^eb^ti li"ngavipallaasena vutta.m, bheriihi ca sa"nkhehi ca mudi"ngehi caati yojanaa. ^b^ratisampanno^eb^ti dibbaaya ratiyaa sama"ngiibhuuto. ^b^naccagiite suvaadite^eb^ti nacce ca giite ca sundare vaadite ca, naccane ca gaayane ca sundare vaadite ca hetubhuute. nimittatthe hi eta.m bhumma.m, pavattiteti vaa vacanaseso.

[03] 1181^b^.^eb^ ^b^dibbaa te vividhaa ruupaa^eb^ti devalokapariyaapannaa naanappakaaraa cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa tuyha.m adhippetaa yathaadhippetaa manoramaa ^a^M0.0297^ea^ vijjantiiti kiriyaapada.m aanetvaa yojetabba.m. ^b^dibbaa saddaa^eb^tiaadiisupi eseva nayo.

[03] 1185^b^.^eb^ ^b^ka.n.dako sahajo aha^eb^nti ettha ^b^aha^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m. ``ahuu''ti keci pa.t.thanti, ka.n.dako naama assaraajaa mahaasattena saha ekasmi.myeva divase jaatattaa sahajo ahosinti attho.

[03] 1186^b^.^eb^ ^b^a.d.dharattaaya^eb^nti a.d.dharattiya.m, majjhimayaamasamayeti attho. ^b^bodhaaya mabhinikkhamii^eb^ti ma-kaaro padasandhikaro, abhisambodhiattha.m mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamiiti attho. ^b^muduuhi paa.niihii^eb^ti muduhatthata.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m vadati. ^b^jaalitambanakhehii^eb^ti jaalavantehi abhilohitanakhehi. tena jaalahatthata.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m tambanakhata.m anubya~njana~nca dasseti.

[03] 1187^b^.^eb^ ^b^satthi^eb^ naama ja"nghaa, idha pana satthino aasanna.t.thaanabhuuto ^a^P0.0316^ea^ uuruppadeso ``satthii''ti vutto. ^b^aako.tayitvaanaa^eb^ti appo.thetvaa. ^b^``vaha sammaa''ti cabravii^eb^ti ``samma ka.n.daka, ajjekaratti.m ma.m vaha, mayha.m opavuyha.m hohii''ti ca kathesi. vahane pana payojana.m tadaa mahaasattena dassita.m vadanto ^b^``aha.m loka.m taarayissa.m, patto sambodhimuttama''^eb^nti aaha. tena ``aha.m uttama.m anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m patto adhigato hutvaa sadevaka.m loka.m sa.msaaramahoghato taarayissaami, tasmaa nayida.m gamana.m ya.mki~nciiti cinteyyaasii''ti gamane payojanassa anuttarabhaava.m dasseti.

[03] 1188-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^haaso^eb^ti tu.t.thi. ^b^vipulo^eb^ti mahaau.laaro. ^b^abhisiisi^eb^nti aasisi.m icchi.m sampa.ticchi.m ^a^V0.0270^ea^. ^b^abhiruu.lha~nca ma.m ~natvaa, sakyaputta.m mahaayasa^eb^nti pattha.tavipulayasa.m sakyaraajaputta.m mahaasatta.m ma.m abhiruyha nisinna.m jaanitvaa. ^b^vahissa^eb^nti nesi.m.

[03] 1190-91^b^.^eb^ ^b^paresa^eb^nti pararaajuuna.m. ^b^vijita^eb^nti desa.m pararajja.m. ^b^ohaayaa^eb^ti vissajjitvaa. ^b^apakkamii^eb^ti apakkamitu.m aarabhi. ``paribbajii''ti ca pa.thanti. ^b^parilehisa^eb^nti parito lehi.m. ^b^udikkhisa^eb^nti olokesi.m.

[03] 1192-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^garukaabaadha^eb^nti ^a^M0.0298^ea^ garuka.m baa.lha.m aabaadha.m, mara.nantika.m dukkhanti attho. tenaaha ^b^``khippa.m me mara.na.m ahuu''^eb^ti. so hi anekaasu jaatiisu mahaasattena da.lhabhattiko hutvaa aagato, tasmaa viyogadukkha.m sahitu.m naasakkhi, ``sammaasambodhi.m adhigantu.m nikkhanto''ti pana sutvaa niraamisa.m u.laara.m piitisomanassa~nca uppajji, tena mara.naanantara.m taavati.msesu nibbatti, u.laaraa cassa dibbasampattiyo paaturahesu.m. tena vutta.m ^b^``tasseva aanubhaavenaa''^eb^ti, .thaanagatassa pasaadamayapu~n~nassa balena. ^b^devo devapuramhivaa^eb^ti taavati.msabhavane sakko devaraajaa viya.

[03] 1194^b^.^eb^ ^b^ya~nca^eb^ ^a^P0.0317^ea^ ^b^me ahuvaa haaso, sadda.m sutvaana bodhiyaa^eb^ti ``patto sambodhimuttama''nti pa.thamatara.m bodhisadda.m sutvaa tadaa mayha.m haaso ahu, ya.m haasassa bhavana.m sussana.m, ^b^teneva kusalamuulena^eb^ teneva kusalabiijena ^b^phusissa^eb^nti phusissaami paapu.nissaami.

[03] 1195^b^.^eb^ eva.m devaputto yathaadhigataaya anaagataaya bhavasampattiyaa kaara.nabhuuta.m attano kusalakamma.m kathento idaani attanaa bhagavato santika.m gantukaamopi puretara.m therena satthu vandana.m pesento ^b^``sace''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^sace gaccheyyaasii^eb^ti yadi gamissasi. ``sace gacchasii''ti keci pa.thanti, so evattho. ^b^mamaapi na.m vacanenaa^eb^ti na kevala.m tava sabhaaveneva, atha kho mamaapi vacanena bhagavanta.m. ^b^vajjaasii^eb^ti vadeyyaasi, mamaapi ^b^sirasaa vandana^eb^nti yojanaa.

[03] 1196^b^.^eb^ yadipi daani vandana~nca pesemi, pesetvaa eva pana na ti.t.thaamiiti dassento aaha ^b^``ahampi da.t.thu.m gacchissa.m, jina.m appa.tipuggala''^eb^nti. gamane pana da.lhatara.m kaara.na.m dassetu.m ^b^``dullabha.m dassana.m hoti, lokanaathaana taadina''^eb^nti aaha.

[03] 1197^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0299^ea^ ^b^sutvaa gira.m cakkhumato^eb^ti pa~ncahi cakkhuuhi cakkhumato sammaasambuddhassa vacana.m sutvaa. ^b^dhammacakkhu^eb^nti sotaapattimagga.m. ^b^visodhayii^eb^ti adhigacchi. adhigamoyeva hi tassa visodhana.m.

[03] 1198^b^.^eb^ ^b^visodhetvaa di.t.thigata^eb^nti di.t.thigata.m samugghaatetvaa. ^b^vicikiccha.m vataani caa^eb^ti so.lasavatthuka.m a.t.thavatthuka~nca vicikiccha~nca ``siilabbatehi suddhii''ti pavattanakasiilabbataparaamaase ^a^P0.0318^ea^ ca visodhayiiti yojanaa. tattha hi saha pariyaayehi tathaa pavattaa paraamaasaa ``vataanii''ti vutta.m. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^anekava.n.na.m darasokanaasana^eb^nti anekava.n.navimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano he.t.thaa vuttanayena devacaarika.m caranto taavati.msabhavana.m agamaasi. atha na.m anekava.n.no devaputto disvaa sa~njaatagaaravabahumaano upasa"nkamitvaa a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. thero --
[21] ``samassamo ^a^V0.0272^ea^ natthi kuto panuttaro, yasena pu~n~nena ca iddhiyaa ca.
[27] sabbe ca devaa tidasaga.naa samecca, ta.m ta.m namassanti sasi.mva devaa.
[22] imaa ca te accharaayo samantato, naccanti gaayanti pamodayanti..
[21] ``aha.m bhadante ahuvaasi pubbe, sumedhanaamassa jinassa saavako.
[22] puthujjano ananubodhohamasmi, so satta vassaani paribbajissaha.m..
[22] ratanuccaya.m hemajaalena channa.m, vanditvaa thuupasmi.m mana.m pasaadayi.m..
[21] ``na maasi daana.m na ca matthi daatu.m, pare ca kho tattha samaadapesi.m.
[22] puujetha na.m puujaniiyassa dhaatu.m, eva.m kira saggamito gamissatha..
[22] na tassa pu~n~nassa khayampi ajjhaga''nti.. -- kathesi.

[03] ito kira ti.msakappasahasse sumedho naama sammaasambuddho loke uppajjitvaa sadevaka.m loka.m ^a^V0.0273^ea^ ekobhaasa.m katvaa katabuddhakicco parinibbuto, manussehi ca bhagavato dhaatu.m gahetvaa ratanacetiye kate a~n~nataro puriso satthu saasane pabbajitvaa satta vassaani brahmacariya.m ^a^M0.0301^ea^ caritvaa anava.t.thitacittataaya kukkuccako hutvaa uppabbaji. uppabbajito ca sa.mvegabahulataaya dhammacchandavantataaya ca cetiya"nga.ne sammajjanaparibha.n.daadiini karonto niccasiilauposathasiilaani rakkhanto dhamma.m su.nanto a~n~ne ca pu~n~nakiriyaaya samaadapento vicari. so aayupariyosaane kaalakato taavati.msesu nibbatti. so pu~n~nakammassa u.laarabhaavena mahesakkho ^a^P0.0320^ea^ mahaanubhaavo sakkaadiihi devataahi sakkatapuujito hutvaa tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cuto aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena taavati.msabhavane nibbatti, ``anekava.n.no''ti na.m devataa sa~njaani.msu. ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``atha na.m anekava.n.no devaputto...pe0... na tassa pu~n~nassa khayampi ajjhaganti kathesii''ti.

[03] 1199^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^anekava.n.na^eb^nti niilapiitaadivasena vividhava.n.nataaya anantaravimaanaadiina.m vividhasa.n.thaanataaya ca naanaavidhava.n.na.m. ^b^darasokanaasana^eb^nti siitalabhaavena darathapari.laahaana.m vinodanato manu~n~nataaya dassaniiyataaya ca sokassa anokaasato darasokanaasana.m. ^b^anekacitta^eb^nti naanaavidhacittaruupa.m. ^b^sunimmito bhuutapatiivaa^eb^ti taavati.msakaayikopi u.laaradibbabhogataaya sunimmitadevaraajaa viya modasi tussasi abhiramasi.

[03] 1200^b^.^eb^ ^b^samassamo^eb^ti samo eva hutvaa samo, nibbariyaayena sadiso te tuyha.m natthi, kuto pana kena kaara.nena uttari adhiko ko naama siyaa. kena pana samataa uttaritarataa caati aaha ^b^``yasena pu~n~nena ca iddhiyaa caa''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^yasenaa^eb^ti parivaarena. ^b^iddhiyaa^eb^ti aanubhaavena. ^b^yasenaa^eb^ti vaa issariyena, ^b^iddhiyaa^eb^ti deviddhiyaa. ^b^yasenaa^eb^ti vaa vibhavasampattiyaa, ^b^iddhiyaa^eb^ti yathicchi tassa kaamagu.nassa ijjhanena. ^b^yasenaa^eb^ti vaa kittighosena, ^b^iddhiyaa^eb^ti samiddhiyaa. ^b^pu~n~nenaa^eb^ti tattha tattha vuttaavasi.t.thapu~n~naphalena, pu~n~nakammeneva vaa.

[03] ^b^``sabbe ca devaa''^eb^ti saama~n~nato gahitamattha.m ^b^``tidasaga.naa''^eb^ti iminaa visesetvaa vutta.m. ekaccassa pacceka.m nipaccakaara.m karontaapi pamuditaa na karonti ^a^M0.0302^ea^, na evametassa ^a^P0.0321^ea^. etassa pana pamuditaapi karontiyevaati dassetu.m ^b^``sameccaa''^eb^ti vutta.m. ^b^ta.m ta^eb^nti ta.m tva.m. ^b^sasi.mva devaa^eb^ti yathaa naama sukkapakkhapaa.tipadiya.m dissamaana.m sasi.m canda.m manussaa devaa ca aadarajaataa namassanti, eva.m ta.m sabbepi tidasaga.naa namassantiiti attho.

[03] 1203^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhadante^eb^ti ^a^V0.0274^ea^ thera.m gaaravabahumaanena samudaacarati. ^b^ahuvaasi^eb^nti ahosi.m. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti purimajaatiya.m. ^b^sumedhanaamassa jinassa saavako^eb^ti sumedhoti eva.m paaka.tanaamassa sammaasambuddassa saasane pabbajitabhaavena saavako. ^b^puthuujjano^eb^ti anariyo. tatthaapi saccaana.m anubodhamattassaapi abhaavena ^b^ananubodho. so satta vassaani paribbajissaha^eb^nti so aha.m satta sa.mvaccharaani pabbajjaagu.namattena vicari.m, uttarimanussadhamma.m naadhigacchinti adhippaayo.

[03] 1204^b^.^eb^ ^b^ratanuccaya^eb^nti ma.nikanakaadiratanehi uccita.m ussitaratanacetiya.m. ^b^hemajaalena channa^eb^nti samantato upari ca ka~ncanajaalena pa.ticchaadita.m. ^b^vanditvaa^eb^ti pa~ncapati.t.thitena tattha tattha pa.naama.m katvaa. ^b^thuupasmi.m mana.m pasaadayi^eb^nti ``sabba~n~nugu.naadhi.t.thaanaaya vata dhaatuyaa aya.m thuupo''ti thuupasmi.m citta.m pasaadesi.m.

[03] 1205^b^.^eb^ ^b^na maasi daana^eb^nti me mayaa kata.m daana.m naasi naahosi. kasmaa pana? ^b^na ca metthi daatu^eb^nti me mama pariggahabhuuta.m daana.m daatu.m na atthi, na ki~nci deyyavatthu vijjati, ^b^pare ca kho^eb^ satte ^b^tattha^eb^ daane ^b^samaadapesi.m^eb^. ``paresa~nca tattha samaadapesi''nti ca pa.thanti, tattha ^b^paresa^eb^nti upayogatthe saamivacana.m da.t.thabba.m ^a^P0.0322^ea^. ^b^puujetha na^eb^ntiaadi samaadapanaakaaradassana.m, ta.m dhaatunti yojanaa. ^b^eva.m kiraa^eb^ti ^b^kira^eb^-saddo anussavattho.

[03] 1206^b^.^eb^ ^b^na tassa pu~n~nassa khayampi ajjhaga^eb^nti tassa tadaa sumedha.m bhagavanta.m uddissa katassa pu~n~nakammassa parikkhaya.m naadhigacchi.m, tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesa.m paccanubhomiiti dasseti. ya.m panettha na vutta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa suvi~n~neyyamevaati da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ^b^ala"nkato^eb^ ^a^M0.0303^ea^ ^b^ma.t.thaku.n.dalii^eb^ti ma.t.thaku.n.daliivimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena samayena saavatthivaasii eko braahma.no addho mahaddhano mahaabhogo assaddho appasanno micchaadi.t.thiko kassaci ki~nci na deti, adaanato eva ``adinnapubbako''ti pa~n~naayittha. so micchaadi.t.thibhaavena ca luddhabhaavena ca tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa da.t.thumpi na icchati. ma.t.thaku.n.dala.m naama attano putta~nca sikkhaapesi ``taata ^a^V0.0275^ea^, tayaa sama.no gotamo tassa saavakaa ca na upasa"nkamitabbaa na da.t.thabbaa''ti. sopi tathaa akaasi. athassa putto gilaano ahosi, braahma.no dhanakkhayabhayena bhesajja.m na kaaresi, roge pana va.d.dhiteva vejje pakkositvaa dassesi. vejjaa tassa sariira.m oloketvaa ``atekiccho''ti ta.m ~natvaa apakkami.msu. braahma.no ``putte abbhantare mate niihara.na.m dukkha''nti putta.m bahidvaarako.t.thake nipajjaapesi.

[03] bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaye mahaakaru.naasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya loka.m volokento addasa ^a^P0.0323^ea^ ma.t.thaku.n.daliimaa.nava.m khii.naayuka.m tadaheva cavanadhamma.m, nirayasa.mvattanika~ncassa kamma.m katokaasa.m. ``sace panaaha.m tattha gamissaami, so mayi citta.m pasaadetvaa devaloke nibbattitvaa pitara.m aa.laahane rodamaana.m upagantvaa sa.mvejessati, eva.m so ca tassa pitaa ca mama santika.m aagamissati, mahaajanakaayo sannipatissati tattha mayaa dhamme desite mahaadhammaabhisamayo bhavissatii''ti eva.m pana ~natvaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho ma.t.thaku.n.daliimaa.navassa pitu gehasamiipe .thatvaa chabba.n.nabuddhara.msiyo vissajjesi. taa disvaa maa.navo ``kimeta''nti ito cito ca vilokento addasa bhagavanta.m danta.m gutta.m santindriya.m dvatti.msaaya mahaapurisalakkha.nehi asiitiyaa anubya~njanehi byaamappabhaaya ketumaalaaya ca vijjotamaana.m anupamaaya buddhasiriyaa acinteyyena buddhaanubhaavena virocamaana.m. disvaa tassa etadahosi ``buddho nu kho bhagavaa idhaanuppatto, yassaaya.m ruupasampadaa attano tejasaa suuriyampi abhibhavati, kantabhaavena candima.m, upasantabhaavena ^a^M0.0304^ea^ sabbepi sama.nabraahma.ne, upasamena naama ettheva bhavitabba.m, ayameva ca ma~n~ne imasmi.m loke aggapuggalo, mameva ca anukampaaya idhaanuppatto''ti buddhaaramma.naaya piitiyaa nirantara.m phu.tasariiro anappaka.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedento pasannacitto a~njali.m paggayha nipajji. ta.m disvaa bhagavaa ``ala.m imassa ettakena sagguupapattiyaa''ti pakkaami.

[03] sopi ta.m piitisomanassa.m avijahantova kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu dvaadasayojanike vimaane nibbatti. pitaa panassa sariirasakkaara.m karitvaa dutiyadivase paccuusavelaaya.m aa.laahana.m gantvaa ``haa haa ma.t.thaku.n.dali, haa haa ma.t.thaku.n.dalii''ti paridevamaano aa.laahana.m anuparikkamanto rodati. devaputto attano ^a^P0.0324^ea^ vibhavasampatti.m oloketvaa ``kuto nu kho aha.m idhaagato ki~nca kamma.m katvaa''ti upadhaarento attano purimattabhaava.m ~natvaa tattha ca mara.nakaale bhagavati pavattita.m cittappasaada.m manohara.m a~njalikara.namatta.m disvaa ``aho mahaanubhaavaa buddhaa bhagavanto''ti saatisaya.m tathaagate sa~njaatappasaadabahumaano ``adinnapubbakabraahma.no nu kho ki.m karotii''ti ^a^V0.0276^ea^ upadhaarento aa.laahane rodamaana.m disvaa ``aya.m mayha.m pubbe bhesajjamattampi akatvaa idaani niratthaka.m aa.laahane rodati, handa na.m sa.mvejetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapessaamii''ti devalokato aagantvaa ma.t.thaku.n.daliiruupena rodamaano ``haa haa canda, haa haa suuriyaa''ti baahaa paggayha kandanto pitu samiipe a.t.thaasi. atha na.m braahma.no ``aya.m ma.t.thaku.n.dalii aagato''ti cintetvaa gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] baahaa paggayha kandasi, vanamajjhe ki.m dukkhito tuva''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^ala"nkato^eb^ti vibhuusito. ^b^ma.t.thaku.n.dalii^eb^ti sariirappadesassa agha.msanattha.m maalaalataadayo adassetvaa ma.t.thaakaareneva kataku.n.dalo. atha vaa ^b^ma.t.thaku.n.dalii^eb^ti visuddhaku.n.dalo, taapetvaa jaatihi"ngulikaaya majjitvaa dhovitvaa suukaralomena majjitaku.n.daloti attho ^a^M0.0305^ea^. ^b^maaladhaarii^eb^ti maala.m dhaarento, pi.landhitamaaloti attho. ^b^haricandanussado^eb^ti rattacandanena sabbaso anulittagatto. ^b^ki^eb^nti pucchaavacana.m. ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti dukkhappatto. ^b^ki.mdukkhito^eb^ti vaa ekameva pada.m, kena dukkhena dukkhitoti attho.
[22] tassa ^a^P0.0325^ea^ cakkayuga.m na vindaami, tena dukkhena jahaami jiivita''nti..
[22] aacikkha me bhaddamaa.nava, cakkayuga.m pa.tipaadayaami te''ti..

[03] ta.m sutvaa maa.navo ``aya.m puttassa bhesajja.m akatvaa puttapatiruupaka.m ma.m disvaa rodanto `suva.n.naadimaya.m rathacakka.m karomii'ti vadati, hotu nigga.nhissaami na''nti cintetvaa ``kiiva mahanta.m me cakkayuga.m karissasii''ti vatvaa ``yaava mahanta.m aaka"nkhasii''ti vutte ``candimasuuriyehi me attho, te me dehii''ti yaacanto --
[21] ``so ^a^V0.0277^ea^ maa.navo tassa paavadi, candasuuriyaa ubhayettha dissare.
[22] sova.n.namayo ratho mama, tena cakkayugena sobhatii''ti..
[21] ``baalo kho tva.m asi maa.nava, yo tva.m patthayase apatthiya.m.
[22] ma~n~naami tuva.m marissasi, na hi tva.m lacchasi candasuuriye''ti..
[03] atha ^a^M0.0306^ea^ na.m maa.navo ``ki.m pana pa~n~naayamaanassatthaaya rodanto baalo hoti, udaahu apa~n~naayamaanassaa''ti vatvaa --
[22] peto kaalakato na dissati, ko nidha kandata.m baalyataro''ti..
[03] ta.m ^a^P0.0326^ea^ sutvaa braahma.no ``yutta.m esa vadatii''ti sallakkhetvaa --
[21] ``sacca.m kho vadesi maa.nava, ahameva kandata.m baalyataro.
[22] canda.m viya daarako ruda.m, peta.m kaalakataabhipatthayi''nti.. --
[25] vatvaa tassa kathaaya nissoko hutvaa maa.navassa thuti.m karonto imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
[22] vaarinaa viya osi~nca.m, sabba.m nibbaapaye dara.m..
[22] na socaami na rodaami, tava sutvaana maa.navaa''ti..

[03] 1208-10^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0278^ea^ ^b^rathapa~njaro^eb^ti rathuupattha.m. ^b^na vindaamii^eb^ti na labhaami. ^b^bhaddamaa.navaa^eb^ti aalapana.m. ^b^pa.tipaadayaamii^eb^ti sampaadetvaa dadaami, maa cakkayugaabhaavena jiivita.m jahiiti adhippaayo. ^b^ubhayettha dissare^eb^ti ubhopi ettha candasuuriyaa aakaase dissanti. ^b^ya^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro, ubhaye etthaati vaa padavibhaago.
