[03] 1212^b^.^eb^ ^b^gamanaagamana^eb^nti divase divase ogamanuggamanavasena candasuuriyaana.m gamana.m aagamana~nca dissati. ``gamanogamana''ntipi paa.li, uggamana.m ogamana~ncaati ^a^M0.0307^ea^ attho. ^b^va.n.nadhaatuu^eb^ti siitibhaavavisi.t.thaa kantabhaavabhaasuraa, u.nhabhaavavisi.t.thaa tikkhabhaavabhaasuraa ca va.n.nanibhaa. ^b^ubhayatthaa^eb^ti cande suuriye caati dviisupi va.n.nadhaatu dissatiiti yojetabba.m. ^b^viithiyaa^eb^ti pavattanaviithiya.m aakaase, naagaviithiyaadiviithiya.m vaa. ``ubhayetthaa''tipi paa.tho, ubhaye etthaati padavisandhi. ^b^baalyataro^eb^ti baalataro atisayena baalo.

[03] 1213^b^.^eb^ ima.m ^a^P0.0327^ea^ pana katha.m sutvaa ``alabbhaniiyavatthu.m vataaha.m patthetvaa kevala.m sokagginaa .dayhaami, ki.m me niratthakena anayabyasanenaa''ti pa.tisa"nkhaane a.t.thaasi. atha devaputto ma.t.thaku.n.daliiruupa.m pa.tisa.mharitvaa attano dibbaruupeneva a.t.thaasi. braahma.no pana ta.m anoloketvaa maa.navavohaareneva voharanto ^b^``sacca.m kho vadesi maa.navaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^canda.m viya daarako ruda^eb^nti canda.m abhipatthaya.m rudanto daarako viyaati attho. ^b^kaalakataabhipatthayi^eb^nti kaalakata.m abhipatthayi.m. ``abhipatthaya''ntipi paa.tho.
[03] 1214-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^aaditta^eb^nti sokagginaa aaditta.m. ^b^nibbaapaye dara^eb^nti nibbaapayi daratha.m sokapari.laaha.m. ^b^abbahii^eb^ti uddhari.
[03] atha braahma.no soka.m vinodetvaa attano upadesadaayaka.m dibbaruupena .thita.m disvaa ``ko naama tva''nti pucchanto --
[22] ko vaa tva.m kassa vaa putto, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya''nti.. --
[21] ``ya~nca ^a^V0.0279^ea^ kandasi ya~nca rodasi, putta.m aa.laahane saya.m dahitvaa.
[22] svaaha.m kusala.m karitvaa kamma.m, tidasaana.m sahabyata.m gato''ti.. --
[25] attaana.m ^a^M0.0308^ea^ kathesi. tattha ^b^ya~nca kandasi ya~nca rodasii^eb^ti ya.m tava putta.m ma.t.thaku.n.dali.m uddissa rodasi, assuuni mu~ncasi.
[21] ``appa.m ^a^P0.0328^ea^ vaa bahu.m vaa naaddasaama, daana.m dadantassa sake agaare.
[22] uposathakamma.m vaa taadisa.m, kena kammena gatosi devaloka''nti..
[22] buddha.m vigataraja.m viti.n.naka"nkha.m, addakkhi.m sugata.m anomapa~n~na.m..
[22] taaha.m kusala.m karitvaana kamma.m, tidasaana.m sahabyata.m gato''ti..

[03] 1220-21^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^aabaadhiko^eb^ti aabaadhasama"ngii. ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti teneva aabaadhikabhaavena jaatadukkho. ^b^gilaano^eb^ti gilaayamaanoti attho. ^b^aaturaruupo^eb^ti dukkhavedanaabhitunnakaayo. ^b^vigataraja^eb^nti vigataraagaadiraja.m. ^b^viti.n.naka"nkha^eb^nti sabbaso sa.msayaana.m samucchinnattaa ti.n.navicikiccha.m. ^b^anomapa~n~na^eb^nti paripu.n.napa~n~na.m, sabba~n~nunti attho. ^b^akari^eb^nti akaasi.m. ^b^taaha^eb^nti ta.m aha.m.
[03] eva.m tasmi.m kathenteyeva braahma.nassa sakalasariira.m piitiyaa paripuuri. so ta.m piiti.m pavedento --

[03] tattha anabhi.nhappavattitaaya acchara.m paharitu.m yogganti ^b^acchariya.m,^eb^ abhuutapubbataaya ^b^abbhuta.m^eb^. ubhayenapi vimhayaavahata.myeva dassetvaa ^b^``ahampi muditamano pasannacitto, ajjeva buddha.m sara.na.m vajaamii''^eb^ti aaha.
[03] atha na.m devaputto sara.nagamane siilasamaadaane ca niyojento --
[21] ``ajjeva buddha.m sara.na.m vajaahi, dhamma~nca sa"ngha~nca pasannacitto.
[22] tatheva sikkhaaya padaani pa~nca, akha.n.daphullaani samaadiyassu..
[22] amajjapo maa ca musaa bha.naahi, sakena daarena ca hohi tu.t.tho''ti.. --

[03] 1223^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tathevaa^eb^ti yathaa pasannacitto ``sammaasambuddho bhagavaa''ti buddha.m sara.na.m vajesi, tatheva ``svaakkhaato dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho''ti pasannacitto dhamma~nca sa"ngha~nca sara.na.m vajaahi. yathaa vaa pasannacitto ratanattaya.m sara.na.m vajesi, tatheva ``aya.m eka.msato di.t.theva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca hitasukhaavaho''ti pasannacitto ^b^sikkhaaya^eb^ adhisiilasikkhaaya ^b^padaani^eb^ ko.t.thaasabhuutaani adhicittaadhipa~n~naasikkhaaya vaa upaayabhuutaani pa~ncasiilaani avikopanato ca asa.mkilissanato ca ^b^akha.n.daphullaani samaadiyassu,^eb^ samaadaaya vattassuuti attho.
[03] eva.m ^a^P0.0330^ea^ devaputtena sara.nagamane siilasamaadaane ca niyojito braahma.no tassa vacana.m sirasaa sampa.ticchanto --
[22] karomi tuyha.m vacana.m, tva.msi aacariyo mamaa''ti.. --
[22] amajjapo no ca musaa bha.naami, sakena daarena ca homi tu.t.tho''ti.. --

[03] tato devaputto ``kata.m mayaa braahma.nassa kattabbayuttaka.m, idaani sayameva bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamissatii''ti tattheva antaradhaayi. braahma.nopi kho bhagavati sa~njaatapasaadabahumaano devataaya ca codiyamaano ``sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamissaamii''ti vihaaraabhimukho gacchati. ta.m disvaa mahaajano ``aya.m braahma.no ettaka.m kaala.m tathaagata.m anupasa"nkamitvaa ajja puttasokena upasa"nkamati, kiidisii nu kho dhammadesanaa bhavissatii''ti ta.m anubandhi.

[03] braahma.no bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa evamaaha ``sakkaa nu kho bho gotama ki~nci daana.m adatvaa siila.m vaa arakkhitvaa kevala.m tumhesu pasaadamattena sagge nibbattitu''nti. ``nanu, braahma.na, ajja paccuusavelaaya.m ma.t.thaku.n.dalinaa devaputtena attano devalokuupapattikaara.na.m tuyha.m kathika''nti bhagavaa avoca. tasmi.m kha.ne ma.t.thaku.n.daliidevaputto saha vimaanena aagantvaa dissamaanaruupo vimaanato oruyha bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa a~njali.m paggayha ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. atha bhagavaa tassa.m parisati tena devaputtena katasucarita.m kathetvaa parisaaya cittakallata.m ~natvaa saamukka.msika.m dhammadesana.m akaasi. desanaapariyosaane devaputto ca braahma.no ca sannipatitaparisaa caati caturaasiitiyaa paa.nasahassaana.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^su.notha^eb^ ^a^M0.0311^ea^ ^a^P0.0331^ea^ ^a^V0.0282^ea^ ^b^yakkhassa ca vaa.nijaana caa^eb^ti seriisakavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavati parinibbute aayasmaa kumaarakassapo pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m setabyanagara.m sampatto. tattha paayaasiraaja~n~na.m attano santika.m upagata.m vipariitaggaahato vivecetvaa sammaadassane pati.t.thaapesi. so tato pa.t.thaaya pu~n~napasuto hutvaa sama.nabraahma.naana.m daana.m dento tattha akataparicayataaya asakkacca.m daana.m datvaa aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa caatumahaaraajikabhavane su~n~ne seriisake vimaane nibbatti.

[03] atiite kira kassapassa bhagavato kaale eko khii.naasavatthero a~n~natarasmi.m gaame pi.n.daaya caritvaa bahigaame devasika.m ekasmi.m padese bhattakicca.m akaasi. ta.m disvaa eko gopaalako ``ayyo suuriyaatapena kilamatii''ti pasannacitto catuuhi siriisathambhehi saakhaama.n.dapa.m katvaa adaasi, ma.n.dapassa samiipe siriisarukkha.m ropesiiti ca vadanti. so kaala.m katvaa teneva pu~n~nakammena caatumahaaraajikesu nibbatti, tassa purimakammassa suucaka.m vimaanadvaare siriisavana.m nibbatti va.n.nagandhasampannehi pupphehi sabbakaala.m upasobhamaana.m, tena ta.m vimaana.m ``seriisaka''nti pa~n~naayittha. so ca devaputto eka.m buddhantara.m devesu ceva manussesu ca sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade yasattherassa catuusu vimalaadiisu gihisahaayesu gavampati naama hutvaa bhagavato dhammadesanaaya arahatte pati.t.thito pubbaaci.n.navasena ta.m su~n~navimaana.m disvaa abhi.nha.m ^a^P0.0332^ea^ divaavihaara.m gacchati.

[03] so aparabhaage paayaasidevaputta.m tattha disvaa ``kosi tva.m, aavuso''ti pucchitvaa tena ``aha.m, bhante, paayaasiraaja~n~no idhuupapanno''ti vutte ``nanu tva.m micchaadi.t.thiko vipariitadassano kathamidhuupapanno''ti aaha. atha na.m paayaasidevaputto ``ayyenamhi kumaarakassapattherena micchaadassanato vivecito, pu~n~nakiriyaana.m asakkaccakaaritaaya pana su~n~ne vimaane nibbatto. saadhu, bhante, manussaloka.m gatakaale mama parijanassa aarocetha ^a^M0.0312^ea^ `paayaasiraaja~n~no asakkacca.m daana.m datvaa su~n~na.m seriisakavimaana.m upapanno, tumhe pana sakkacca.m pu~n~naani katvaa tatruupapattiyaa citta.m pa.nidahathaa''ti. thero tassaanukampaaya tathaa akaasi. tepi therassa vacana.m sutvaa tathaa citta.m pa.nidhaaya pu~n~naani katvaa seriisake vimaane nibbatti.msu. seriisakadevaputta.m pana ^a^V0.0283^ea^ vessava.namahaaraajaa marubhuumiya.m chaayuudakarahite magge maggapa.tipannaana.m manussaana.m amanussaparipantha mocanattha.m maggarakkhaka.m .thapesi.

[03] atha aparena samayena a"ngamagadhavaasino vaa.nijaa saka.tasahassa.m bha.n.dassa puuretvaa sindhusoviiradesa.m gacchantaa marukantaare divaa u.nhabhayena magga.m appa.tipajjitvaa ratti.m nakkhattasa~n~naaya magga.m pa.tipajji.msu. te maggamuu.lhaa hutvaa a~n~na.m disa.m agama.msu. tesa.m antare eko upaasako ahosi saddho pasanno siilasampanno arahattappattiyaa upanissayasampanno maataapituuna.m upa.t.thaanattha.m va.nijjaaya gato. ta.m anugga.nhanto seriisakadevaputto saha vimaanena attaana.m dassesi. dassetvaa ca pana ``kasmaa tumhe ima.m chaayuudakarahita.m vaalukaakantaara.m pa.tipannaa''ti pucchi. te cassa tattha attano aagatappakaara.m kathesu.m, tadatthadiipanaa devaputtassa vaa.nijaana~nca vacanapa.tivacanagaathaa honti. aadito pana dve gaathaa taasa.m sambandhadassanattha.m dhammasa"ngaahakehi .thapitaa --
[21] ``su.notha ^a^P0.0333^ea^ yakkhassa ca vaa.nijaana ca, samaagamo yattha tadaa ahosi.
[22] yathaa katha.m itaritarena caapi, subhaasita.m ta~nca su.naatha sabbe..
[21] ``yo so ahu raajaa paayaasi naama, bhummaana.m sahabyagato yasassii.
[22] so modamaanova sake vimaane, amaanuso maanuse ajjhabhaasii''ti..

[03] 1228-9^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^su.nothaa^eb^ti savanaa.nattikavacana.m. ya.m maya.m idaani bha.naama, ta.m su.nothaati. ^b^yakkhassaa^eb^ti devassa. devo hi manussaana.m ekaccaana.m ^a^M0.0313^ea^ devaana~nca puujaniiyabhaavato ``yakkho''ti vuccati. apica sakkopi cattaaro mahaaraajaanopi vessava.napaarisajjaapi purisopi ``yakkho''ti vuccati. tathaa hi ``atibaa.lha.m kho aya.m yakkho pamatto viharati, ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m yakkha.m sa.mvejeyya''ntiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.393) sakko ``yakkho''ti vutto. ``cattaaro yakkhaa khaggahatthaa''tiaadiisu mahaaraajaano. ``santi hi, bhante, u.laaraa yakkhaa bhagavato appasannaa''tiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 3.276) vessava.napaarisajjaa. ``ettaavataa yakkhassa suddhii''tiaadiisu (su0 ni0 482) puriso. idha pana vessava.napaarisajjo adhippeto. ^b^vaa.nijaana caa^eb^ti gaathaabandhasukhattha.m anunaasikalopa.m katvaa vutta.m. ^b^samaagamo^eb^ti samodhaana.m. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yasmi.m va.n.nupathe. ^b^tadaa^eb^ti tasmi.m maggamuu.lhaa hutvaa gamanakaale. ^b^itaritarena caapii^eb^ti itariitara~ncaapi, ida.m yathaati iminaa yojetabba.m. aya~nhettha attho ^a^V0.0284^ea^ -- seriisakadevaputtassa vaa.nijaana~nca tadaa yattha samaagamo ahosi, ta.m su.notha, yathaa vaapi tehi ^a^P0.0334^ea^ a~n~nama~n~na.m subhaasita.m sulapita.m katha.m pavattita.m, ta~nca sabbe ohitacittaa su.naathaati. ^b^bhummaana^eb^nti bhummadevaana.m.
[22] suduggame va.n.nupathassa majjhe, va"nka.mbhayaa na.t.thamanaa manussaa..
[21] ``nayidha phalaa muulamayaa ca santi, upaadaana.m natthi kutodha bhakkho.
[22] a~n~natra pa.msuuhi ca vaalukaahi ca, tattaahi u.nhaahi ca daaru.naahi ca..
[21] ``atha ^a^M0.0314^ea^ tumhe kena va.n.nena, kimaasamaanaa ima.m padesa~nhi.
[22] anupavi.t.thaa sahasaa samecca, lobhaa bhayaa atha vaa sampamuu.lhaa''ti..

[03] 1230^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^va"nke^eb^ti sa.msaya.t.thaane. yattha pavi.t.thaana.m ``jiivissaama nu kho, marissaama nu kho''ti jiivite sa.msayo hoti, taadise ^b^ara~n~ne. amanussa.t.thaane^eb^ti amanussaana.m pisaacaadiina.m sa~ncara.na.t.thaane, manussaana.m vaa agocara.t.thaane. ^b^kantaare^eb^ti nirudake iri.ne, ka.m taarenti nayanti etthaati hi kantaaro, udaka.m gahetvaa taritabba.t.thaana.m. tenaaha ^b^``appodake''^eb^ti. appa-saddo hettha abhaavattho ``appiccho appanigghoso''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 8.23; cuu.lava0 456) viya. ^b^va.n.nupathassa majjhe^eb^ti vaalukaakantaaramajjheti attho. ^b^va"nka.mbhayaa^eb^ti va"nkehi bhiitaa. va"nkehi bhaya.m etesanti ^a^P0.0335^ea^ ``va"nkabhayaa''ti vattabbe gaathaasukhattha.m saanunaasika.m katvaa ``va"nka.mbhayaa''ti vutta.m. ida~nca vaalukaakantaarapavesanato pubbe tesa.m uppannabhaya.m sandhaaya vutta.m. ^b^na.t.thamanaa^eb^ti maggasativippavaasena na.t.thamaanasaa, maggamuu.lhaati attho. ^b^manussaa^eb^ti tesa.m aalapana.m.

[03] 1231^b^.^eb^ ^b^idhaa^eb^ti imasmi.m marukantaare. ^b^phalaa^eb^ti ambajambutaalanaa.likeraadiphalaani na santiiti yojanaa. ^b^muulamayaa caa^eb^ti muulaaniyeva muulamayaa, vallikandaadiini sandhaaya vadati. ^b^upaadaana.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0285^ea^ ^b^natthii^eb^ti ki~ncaapi ki~nci bhakkha.m natthi, upaadaana.m vaa indhana.m, aggissa indhanamattampi natthi, kuto kena kaara.nena idha marukantaare bhakkho siyaati attho. ya.m pana atthi tattha, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``a~n~natra pa.msuuhii''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m.

[03] 1232^b^.^eb^ ^b^ujja"ngala^eb^nti ja"ngala.m vuccati luukhadhuusaro anudako bhuumippadeso, ta.m pana .thaana.m ja"ngalatopi ukka.msena ja"ngalanti aaha ``ujja"ngala''nti. tenaaha ^b^``tattamiva.m kapaala''^eb^nti, tatta.m ayokapaalasadisanti attho. gaathaasukhattha~ncettha saanunaasika.m katvaa vutta.m, tattamivaicceva da.t.thabba.m. ^b^anaayasa^eb^nti natthi ettha aayo sukhanti anaaya.m, tato eva jiivita.m siiyati ^a^M0.0315^ea^ vinaasetiiti anaayasa.m. atha vaa na aayasanti anaayasa.m. ^b^paralokenaa^eb^ti narakena tulya.m. naraka~nhi sattaana.m ekantaanatthataaya parabhuuto pa.tisattubhuuto lokoti visesato ``paraloko''ti vuccati, samantato ayomayattaa aayasa~nca, ida.m pana tadabhaavato anaayasa.m, mahato dukkhassa uppatti.t.thaanataaya paralokasadisanti dasseti, ``anassaya''nti ca keci pa.thanti, sukhassa appati.t.thaanabhuutanti attho. ^b^luddaanamaavaasamida.m puraa.na^eb^nti ida.m .thaana.m cirakaalato pa.t.thaaya luddaana.m daaru.naana.m pisaacaadiina.m aavaasabhuuta.m. ^b^abhisattaruupo^eb^ti ``eva.m luukho ^a^P0.0336^ea^ ghoraakaaro hotuu''ti poraa.nehi isiihi sapitasadiso, dinnasapo viyaati attho.

[03] 1233^b^.^eb^ ^b^kena va.n.nenaa^eb^ti kena kaara.nena. ^b^kimaasamaanaa^eb^ti ki.m paccaasiisantaa. ^b^hii^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ``padesampii''ti ca pa.thanti, imampi naama padesanti attho. ^b^sahasaa sameccaa^eb^ti sahasaa aadiinavaanisa.mse avicaaretvaa samavaayena ^b^anupavi.t.thaa^eb^ sappavi.t.thaa. ^b^lobhaa bhayaa atha vaa^eb^ kenaci anatthakaamena palobhitaa lobhato kenaci amanussaadinaa paripaatitaa bhayaa vaa. atha vaa ^b^sampamuu.lhaa^eb^ti maggavippana.t.thaa ima.m padesa.m anupavi.t.thaati yojanaa.
[21] ``magadhesu a"ngesu ca satthavaahaa, aaropayitvaa pa.niya.m puthutta.m.
[22] te yaamase sindhusoviirabhuumi.m, dhanatthikaa uddaya.m patthayaanaa..
[22] etena vegena aayaama sabbe, ratti.m magga.m pa.tipannaa vikaale..
[22] suduggame va.n.nupathassa majjhe, disa.m na jaanaama pamuu.lhacittaa..
[22] tatuttari.m jiivitamaasamaanaa, disvaa patiitaa sumanaa udaggaa''ti..

[03] 1234^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0337^ea^ ^b^magadhesu a"ngesu ca satthavaahaa^eb^ti magadhara.t.the ca a"ngara.t.the ca jaataa sa.mva.d.dhaa ta.mnivaasino satthe satthassa ca vaahanakaa satthakaa ceva satthasaamikaa ca. ^b^pa.niya^eb^nti bha.n.da.m. ^b^te^eb^ti te maya.m. ^b^yaamase^eb^ti gacchaama. ^b^sindhusoviirabhuumi^eb^nti sindhudesa.m soviiradesa~nca. ^b^uddaya^eb^nti aanisa.msa.m atirekalaabha.m.

[03] 1235^b^.^eb^ ^b^anadhivaasayantaa^eb^ti adhivaasetu.m asakkontaa. ^b^yoggaanukampa^eb^nti go.naadiina.m sattaana.m anuggaha.m. ^b^etena vegenaa^eb^ti iminaa javena, yena tava dassanato pubbe aayaama aagatamha. ^b^ratti.m magga.m pa.tipannaa^eb^ti rattiya.m magga.m pa.tipannaa. ^b^vikaale^eb^ti akaale avelaaya.m.

[03] 1236^b^.^eb^ ^b^duppayaataa^eb^ti du.t.thu payaataa apathe gataa, tato eva ^b^aparaddhamaggaa. andhaakulaa^eb^ti andhaa viya aakulaa, maggajaananasamatthassa pa~n~naacakkhuno abhaavena andhaa, tato eva aakulaa, ^b^vippana.t.thaa^eb^ ca maggasammuu.lhataaya. ^b^disa^eb^nti gantabbadisa.m, yassa.m disaaya.m sindhusoviiradeso, ta.m disa.m. ^b^pamuu.lhacittaa^eb^ti disaasa.msayasumuu.lhacittaa.

[03] 1237^b^.^eb^ ^b^tava~ncaa^eb^ti tuva~nca. ^b^yakkhaa^eb^ti aalapana.m. ^b^tatuttari.m jiivitamaasamaanaa^eb^ti yo ``ito para.m amhaaka.m jiivita.m natthii''ti jiivitasa.msayo uppanno, idaani tato uttarimpi jiivita.m aasiisantaa. ^b^disvaa^eb^ti dassanahetu. ^b^patiitaa^eb^ti paha.t.thaa. ^b^sumanaa^eb^ti somanassappattaa. ^b^udaggaa^eb^ti udaggaaya piitiyaa udaggacittaa.
[03] eva.m ^a^M0.0317^ea^ vaa.nijehi attano pavattiyaa pakaasitaaya puna devaputto dviihi gaathaahi pucchi --
[21] ``paara.m samuddassa ima~nca va.n.nu.m, vettaacara.m sa"nkupatha~nca magga.m.
[22] nadiyo ^a^P0.0338^ea^ pana pabbataana~nca duggaa, puthuddisaa gacchatha bhogahetu..
[22] ya.m vo suta.m vaa atha vaapi di.t.tha.m, accheraka.m ta.m vo su.noma taataa''ti..

[03] tassattho -- ^b^paara.m samuddassaa^eb^ti samuddassa paratiira.m, ^b^ima~nca^eb^ iidisa.m, ^b^va.n.nu.m^eb^ va.n.nupatha.m vettalataa bandhitvaa aacaritabbato ^b^vettaacara.m magga.m,^eb^ sa"nkuke khaa.nuke ko.t.tetvaa gantabbato ^b^sa"nkupatha.m^eb^ magga.m, ^b^nadiyo pana^eb^ candabhaagaadikaa, ^b^pabbataana~nca^eb^ visamappadesaati eva.m ^b^duggaa puthuddisaa^eb^ bhoganimitta.m ^b^gacchatha,^eb^ eva.m gacchantaa ca ^b^pakkhandiyaana^eb^ pakkhanditvaa anupavisitvaa, ^b^paresa.m^eb^ raajuuna.m ^b^vijita.m^eb^ tattha ^b^verajjake^eb^ videsavaasike ^b^manusse pekkhamaanaa^eb^ gacchatha, eva.mbhuutehi ^b^vo^eb^ tumhehi ^b^ya.m suta.m vaa atha vaa di.t.tha.m^eb^ vaa ^b^accheraka.m^eb^ acchariya.m, ^b^ta.m vo^eb^ santike ^b^taataa^eb^ vaa.nijaa ^b^su.nomaa^eb^ti attano vimaanassa acchariyabhaava.m tehi kathaapetukaamo pucchati.
[21] ``itopi accheratara.m kumaara, na no suta.m vaa atha vaapi di.t.tha.m.
[22] atiitamaanusakameva sabba.m, disvaa na tappaama anomava.n.na.m..
[22] dumaa cime niccaphaluupapannaa, atiiva gandhaa surabhi.m pavaayanti..
[22] da.lho ca vaggu ca susa"ngato ca, atiiva nijjhaanakhamo manu~n~no..
[22] acintiyo sabbagu.nuupapanno, raajaa yathaa vessava.no na.linyaa..

[03] 1240-2^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0319^ea^ ^b^kumaaraa^eb^ti pa.thamavaye .thitattaa devaputta.m aalapati. ^b^sabba^eb^nti devaputta.m tassa vimaanapa.tibaddha~nca sandhaaya vadati. ^b^pokkhara~n~no^eb^ti pokkhara.niyo. ^b^satamussitaase^eb^ti sataratanubbedhaa. ^b^silaapavaa.lassaa^eb^ti silaaya pavaa.lassa ca, silaamayaa pavaa.lamayaati attho. ^b^aayata.msaa^eb^ti diigha.msaa. atha vaa aayataa hutvaa a.t.thaso.lasadvatti.msaadia.msavanto.

[03] 1242^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesuuparii^eb^ti ^a^P0.0340^ea^ tesa.m thambhaana.m upari. ^b^saadhumida^eb^nti sundara.m ida.m tava vimaana.m. ^b^ratanantara^eb^nti ratanantaravanta.m, bhittithambhasopaanaadiisu naanaavidhehi a~n~nehi ratanehi yutta.m. ^b^ka~ncanavedimissa^eb^nti suva.n.namayaaya vedikaaya sahita.m parikkhitta.m. ^b^tapaniiyapa.t.tehi ca saadhuchanna^eb^nti tapaniiyamayehi anekaratanamayehi ca chadanehi tattha tattha su.t.thu chaadita.m.

[03] 1244^b^.^eb^ ^b^jambonaduttattamida^eb^nti ida.m tava vimaana.m yebhuyyena uttattajambunadabhaasura.m. ^b^suma.t.tho paasaadasopaanaphaluupapanno^eb^ti tassa ca so so padeso suma.t.tho su.t.thu majjito, tehi tehi anantarapaasaadehi sopaanavisesehi rama.niiyehi phalakehi ca yutto. ^b^da.lho^eb^ti thiro. ^b^vagguu^eb^ti abhiruupo samuggato. ^b^susa"ngato^eb^ti su.t.thu sa"ngataavayavo a~n~nama~n~naanuruupapaasaadaavayavo. ^b^atiiva nijjhaanakhamo^eb^ti pabhassarabhaavepi ativiya olokanakkhamo. ^b^manu~n~no^eb^ti manoramo.

[03] 1245^b^.^eb^ ^b^ratanantarasmi^eb^nti ratanamaye, ratanabhuute vaa saarabhuute vimaanassa abbhantare. ^b^bahuannapaana^eb^nti pesala.m pahuuta.m anna~nca paana~nca vijjati, upalabbhatiiti adhippaayo. ^b^murajaaalambaratuuriyaghu.t.tho^eb^ti mudi"ngaana.m aalambaraana.m avasi.t.thatuuriyaana~nca saddehi niccaghosito. ^b^abhivanditosii^eb^ti namassito, thomito vaa asi. tenaaha ^b^``thuutivandanaayaa''^eb^ti.
[03] 1246^b^.^eb^ ^b^acintiyo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0289^ea^ acinteyyaanubhaavo. ^b^na.linyaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamake kii.lana.t.thaane yathaa vessava.no mahaaraajaa, eva.m tva.m modasiiti yojanaa.

[03] 1247^b^.^eb^ ^b^aasii^eb^ti ^a^M0.0320^ea^ asi bhavasi. ^b^devindo^eb^ti sakko devaraajaa. ^b^manussabhuuto^eb^ti manussesu bhuuto manussajaatiko. ^b^yakkho^eb^ti ^a^P0.0341^ea^ devaadibhaava.m pucchitvaapi yakkhabhaava.m aasa"nkantaa vadanti.
[21] ``seriisako naama ahamhi yakkho, kantaariyo va.n.nupathamhi gutto.
[22] ima.m padesa.m abhipaalayaami, vacanakaro vessava.nassa ra~n~no''ti.. --
[25] aaha. tattha ^b^ahamhii yakkho^eb^ti aha.m yakkho amhi. ^b^kantaariyo^eb^ti aarakkha.nattha.m kantaare niyutto. ^b^gutto^eb^ti gopako. tenaaha ^b^``abhipaalayaamii''^eb^ti.
[03] idaani vaa.nijaa tassa kammaadiini pucchantaa aaha.msu --
[21] ``adhiccaladdha.m pari.naamaja.m te, saya.mkata.m udaahu devehi dinna.m.
[22] pucchanti ta.m vaa.nijaa satthavaahaa, katha.m tayaa laddhamida.m manu~n~na''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^adhiccaladdha^eb^nti adhiccasamuppattika.m, yadicchaka.m laddhanti attho. ^b^pari.naamaja.m te^eb^ti niyatisa"ngatibhaavapari.nata.m, kaalapari.nata.m vaa. ^b^saya.mkata^eb^nti tayaa sayameva kata.m, deviddhiyaa tayaa sayameva nibbattitanti attho. ^b^udaahu devehi dinna^eb^nti tayaa aaraadhitehi devehi pasaadavasena nissa.t.tha.m.
[03] idaani devaputto caturopi pakaare pa.tikkhipitvaa pu~n~nameva apadisanto --
[21] ``naadhiccaladdha.m na pari.naamaja.m me, na saya.mkata.m na hi devehi dinna.m.
[22] sakehi kammehi apaapakehi, pu~n~nehi me laddhamida.m manu~n~na''nti.. --
[03] ta.m ^a^M0.0321^ea^ ^a^V0.0290^ea^ sutvaa vaa.nijaa puna ``naadhiccaladdha''nti gaathaaya.m pu~n~naadhikameva te caturo pakaare aaropetvaa pu~n~nassa ca saruupa.m pucchi.msu --
[21] ``ki.m te vata.m ki.m pana brahmacariya.m, kissa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
[22] pucchanti ^a^P0.0342^ea^ ta.m vaa.nijaa satthavaahaa, katha.m tayaa laddhamida.m vimaana''nti..
[03] puna devaputto te pa.tikkhipitvaa attaana.m yathuupacita.m pu~n~na~nca dassento --
[21] ``mama.m paayaasiiti ahu sama~n~naa, rajja.m yadaa kaarayi.m kosalaana.m.
[22] natthikadi.t.thi kadariyo paapadhammo, ucchedavaadii ca tadaa ahosi.m..
[21] ``sama.no ca kho aasi kumaarakassapo, bahussuto cittakathii u.laaro.
[22] so me tadaa dhammakatha.m abhaasi, di.t.thivisuukaani vinodayii me..
[27] paa.naatipaataa virato ahosi.m, loke adinna.m parivajjayissa.m.
[22] amajjapo no ca musaa abhaa.ni.m, sakena daarena ca ahosi.m tu.t.tho..
[21] ``ta.m ^a^M0.0322^ea^ me vata.m ta.m pana brahmacariya.m, tassa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
[22] teheva kammehi apaapakehi, pu~n~nehi me laddhamida.m vimaana''nti.. --
[03] atha vaa.nijaa devaputta.m vimaana~ncassa paccakkhato disvaa kammaphala.m saddahitvaa attano kammaphale saddha.m pavedentaa --
[21] ``sacca.m kiraaha.msu naraa sapa~n~naa, ana~n~nathaa vacana.m pa.n.ditaana.m.
[22] yahi.m ^a^P0.0343^ea^ yahi.m gacchati pu~n~nakammo, tahi.m tahi.m modati kaamakaamii..
[21] ``yahi.m ^a^V0.0291^ea^ yahi.m sokapariddavo ca, vadho ca bandho ca parikkileso.
[22] tahi.m tahi.m gacchati paapakammo, na muccati duggatiyaa kadaacii''ti.. --
[25] gaathaadvaya.m avocu.m. tattha ^b^sokapariddavo^eb^ti soko ca paridevo ca. ^b^parikkileso^eb^ti vuttaa anatthuppatti.
[03] eva.m tesu kathentesuyeva vimaanadvaare siriisarukkhato paripaakena muttabandhanaa paripakkaa sipaa.tikaa pati, tena devaputto saparijano domanassappatto ahosi. ta.m disvaa vaa.nijaa --
[22] janassimassa tuyha~nca kumaara, appaccayo kena nu kho ahosii''ti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha.msu. tattha ^b^sammuu.lharuupovaa^eb^ti sokavasena sabbaso muu.lhasabhaavo viya. ^b^jano^eb^ti devajano. ^b^asmi.m muhutte^eb^ti imasmi.m muhuttamatte ^a^M0.0323^ea^. ^b^kalaliikato^eb^ti kalala.m viya kato, kalalanissitaudakiibhuuto viya aaviloti adhippaayo. ^b^janassimassa tuyha~ncaa^eb^ti imassa tava parijanassa tuyha~nca. ^b^appaccayo^eb^ti domanassa.m.
[21] ``ime ca siriisavanaa taataa, dibbaa gandhaa surabhii sampavanti.
[22] te sampavaayanti ima.m vimaana.m, divaa ca ratto ca tama.m nihantvaa..
[22] maanussaka.m ^a^P0.0344^ea^ vassasata.m atiita.m, yadagge kaayamhi idhuupapanno..

[03] 1256^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0292^ea^ ^b^siriisavanaa^eb^ti siriisavipinato. ^b^taataa^eb^ti vaa.nije aalapati. ime tumhaaka.m mayha~nca paccakkhabhuutaa ^b^dibbaa gandhaa surabhii^eb^ ativiya sugandhaayeva samantato ^b^pavanti^eb^ pavaayanti. te dibbaa gandhaa eva.m vaayantaa ^b^ima.m vimaana.m sampavaayanti^eb^ sammadeva gandha.m gaahaapenti, na kevala.m sampavaayanameva, atha kho attano pabhaaya tamampi nihanti. tenaaha ^b^``divaa ca ratto ca tama.m nihantvaa''^eb^ti.

[03] 1260-61^b^.^eb^ ^b^imesa^eb^nti siriisaana.m. ^b^sipaa.tikaa^eb^ti phalaku.t.thilikaa. ^b^phalatii^eb^ti paccitvaa va.n.tato muccati, pu.tabheda.m vaa patvaa sissati. ^b^maanussaka.m vassasata.m atiita^eb^nti yasmaa vassasatassa accayena imassa siriisassa sipaa.tikaa phalati, aya~nca phalitaa, tasmaa mayha.m maanussaka.m vassasata.m atiita.m. ^b^yadagge^eb^ yato pa.t.thaaya, ^b^kaayamhi idha^eb^ imasmi.m devanikaaye ^b^upapanno^eb^ ^a^M0.0324^ea^ nibbatto. mayha~nca devaga.nanaaya pa~nca vassasataani aayu, tasmaa khiiyati me aayuuti sokavasena sampamuu.lhoti dasseti. tenaaha ^b^``disvaanaha.m vassasataani pa~nca...pe0... teneva sokena pamucchitosmii''^eb^ti.
[21] ``katha.m nu soceyya tathaavidho so, laddhaa vimaana.m atula.m ciraaya.
[22] ye caapi kho ittaramupapannaa, te nuuna soceyyu.m parittapu~n~naa''ti.. --

[25] aaha.msu. tattha ^a^P0.0345^ea^ yaadisehi appaayukehi mara.na.m pa.ticca socitabba.m siyaa, taadiso pana eva.m dibbaanubhaavasampanno navutivassasatasahassaayuko katha.m nu soceyya, na socitabbamevaati adhippaayo.
[03] devaputto tattakeneva samassaasetvaa tesa.m vacana.m sampa.ticchanto tesa~nca upadesa.m dento --
[21] ``anucchavi.m ovadiya~nca meta.m, ya.m ma.m tumhe peyyavaaca.m vadetha.
[22] tumhe ca kho taataa mayaanuguttaa, yehicchaka.m tena paletha sotthi''nti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^anucchavi^eb^nti anucchavika.m, tumhaakameva ta.m yuttaruupa.m. ^b^ovadiya~nca meta^eb^nti me mayha.m tumhehi ovadiya.m ovaadavasena vattabbameta.m. ^b^ya.m^eb^ yasmaa, ^b^ma.m^eb^ mayha.m, ^b^tumhe^eb^ ``katha.m nu soceyya''ntiaadinaa ^a^V0.0293^ea^ ^b^peyyavaaca.m^eb^ piyavacana.m ^b^vadetha.^eb^ ya.m vaa peyyavaacaaya vadana.m kathana.m, ta.m tumhaakameva anucchavikanti yojanaa. atha vaa ya.m yasmaa tumhe peyyavaaca.m vadetha, tasmaa anucchavika.m ovadiya~nca ovaditabba.m ovaadaanuruupa.m kaatabba~nca me mayaa kata.m, ki.m pana tanti aaha ^b^``tumhe ca kho taataa''^eb^tiaadi. tattha ^b^mayaanuguttaa^eb^ti imasmi.m amanussapariggahe marukantaare yaava kantaaraatikkamaa mayaa anuguttaa rakkhitaa, ^b^yenicchaka.m^eb^ yathaarucitena, ^b^sotthi.m^eb^ khemena, ^b^paletha^eb^ gacchathaati attho.

[25] gaathamaaha.msu. tattha ^a^P0.0346^ea^ ^b^yathaapayogaa^eb^ti idaani katapa.ti~n~naanuruupapayogaa. ^b^paripu.n.nacaagaa^eb^ti samattacaagaa, u.laarassa mahassa pariyattapariccaagaa. ^b^maha^eb^nti ussavapuuja.m.
[03] puna devaputto mahakara.na.m pa.tikkhipanto kattabbesu ca te niyojento --
[21] ``maa ceva seriisamaha.m akattha, sabba~nca vo bhavissati ya.m vadetha.

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^ya.m vadethaa^eb^ti ya.m tumhe khemena sindhusoviiradesapatti.m tattha ca vipula.m uddaya.m laabha.m paccaasiisantaa ``gantvaa maya''ntiaadiini vadatha. ^b^sabba.m^eb^ ta.m ^b^vo^eb^ tumhaaka.m tatheva bhavissati, tattha nikka"nkhaa hotha, tumhe pana ito pa.t.thaaya ^b^paapaani kammaani^eb^ paa.naatipaataadiini ^b^vivajjayaatha^eb^ parivajjetha. ^b^dhammaanuyoga^eb^nti daanaadikusaladhammassa anuyu~njana.m. ^b^adhi.t.thahaathaa^eb^ti anusikkhatha ida.m seriisakamahanti dasseti.
[03] ya.m pana upaasaka.m anugga.nhanto tesa.m rakkhaavara.na.m kaatukaamo ahosi, tassa gu.na.m kittetvaa ta.m tesa.m uddisanto imaa gaathaayo aaha --
[22] saddho ca caagii ca supesalo ca, vicakkha.no santusito mutiimaa..
[21] ``sa~njaanamaano ^a^M0.0326^ea^ na musaa bha.neyya, paruupaghaataaya na cetayeyya.
[22] vebhuutika.m pesu.na.m no kareyya, sa.nha~nca vaaca.m sakhila.m bha.neyya..
[22] so ^a^P0.0347^ea^ maatara.m pitara~ncaapi jantu, dhammena poseti ariyavutti..
[21] ``ma~n~ne so maataapituuna.m kaara.naa, bhogaani pariyesati na attahetu.
[22] maataapituuna~nca yo accayena, nekkhammapo.no carissati brahmacariya.m..
[21] ``ujuu ava"nko asa.tho amaayo, na lesakappena ca vohareyya.
[22] so taadiso sukatakammakaarii, dhamme .thito kinti labhetha dukkha.m..
[21] ``ta.mkaara.naa paatukatomhi attanaa, tasmaa dhamma.m passatha vaa.nijaase.
[27] a~n~natra teniha bhasmii bhavetha, andhaakulaa vippana.t.thaa ara~n~ne.
[22] ta.m khippamaanena lahu.m parena, sukho have sappurisena sa"ngamo''ti..

[03] 1266^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sa"nghe^eb^ti sattasamuuhe. ^b^vicakkha.no^eb^ti tattha tattha kattabbataaya kusalo. ^b^santusito^eb^ti santu.t.tho. ^b^mutiimaa^eb^ti kammassakata~naa.naadinaa idhalokaparalokahitaana.m munanato mutimaa.

[03] 1267^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa~njaanamaano na musaa bha.neyyaa^eb^ti sampajaanamusaa na bhaaseyya. ^b^vebhuutika^eb^nti sahitaana.m vinaabhaavakara.nato ``vebhuutika''nti laddhanaama.m pisu.na.m, ^b^no kareyya^eb^ na vadeyya.

[03] 1268^b^.^eb^ ^b^sappatisso^eb^ti ^a^M0.0327^ea^ patissayo garu.t.thaaniyesu nivaatavuttikattaa soracca.m, saha patissenaati sappatisso. ^b^adhisiile^eb^ti upaasakena rakkhitabbaadhisiilasikkhaaya. ^b^ariyavuttii^eb^ti parisuddhavutti.

[03] 1270^b^.^eb^ ^b^lesakappenaa^eb^ti kappiyalesena. ^b^na ca vohareyyaa^eb^ti maayaasaa.theyyavasena vacana.m na nicchaareyya. ^b^dhamme .thito kinti labhetha dukkha^eb^nti eva.m vuttanayena dhamme .thito dhammacaarii samacaarii kinti kena pakaarena dukkha.m labhetha paapu.neyya.

[03] 1271^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta.mkaara.naa^eb^ti tannimitta.m tassa upaasakassa hetu. ^b^paatukatomhi attanaa^eb^ti sayameva tumhaaka.m aha.m paaturahosi.m. ``attaana''ntipi paa.tho, mama attaana.m tumhaaka.m paatvaakaasinti attho. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa aha.m dhamma.m apacaayamaano ta.m rakkhanto tumhepi rakkhaami, tasmaa ^b^dhamma.m passatha^eb^ dhammameva caritabba.m katvaa oloketha. ^b^a~n~natra teniha bhasmii bhavethaa^eb^ti tena upaasakena vinaa ce aagataa, imasmi.m marukantaare anaathaa appa.tisara.naa bhasmabhaava.m gaccheyyaatha. ^b^khippamaanenaa^eb^ti eva.m khippantena vambhantena pii.lantena. ^b^lahu^eb^nti sukara.m. ^b^parenaa^eb^ti adhika.m, a~n~nena vaa. tasmaa ^b^sukho have sappurisena sa"ngamo^eb^ti. so hi khantisoracce nivi.t.tho kenaci ki~nci vuttopi na pa.tippharatiiti adhippaayo.
[27] ki.m naamadheyya.m ki.m pana tassa gotta.m.
[26] mayampi na.m da.t.thukaamamha yakkha, yassaanukampaaya idhaagatosi.
[22] laabhaa hi tassa yassa tuva.m pihesii''ti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha.msu. tattha ^b^ki.m naama so^eb^ti naamato so jantu satto ko naama. ^b^ki~nca karoti kamma^eb^nti kasiva.nijjaadiisu kiidisa.m kamma.m karoti. ^b^ki.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0328^ea^ ^b^naamadheyya^eb^nti maataapituuhi kata.m ^a^P0.0349^ea^ pana ``tisso phusso''tiaadiisu tassa ki.m naamadheyya.m, ``bhaggavo bhaaradvaajo''tiaadiisu ki.m vaa tassa gotta.m. ^b^yassa tuva.m pihesii^eb^ti ya.m tuva.m piyaayasi.
[22] maa kho na.m hii.littha supesalo so''ti.. --

[25] aaha. tattha ^b^kappako^eb^ti nhaapito. ^b^sambhavanaamadheyyo^eb^ti sambhavoti eva.mnaamo. ^b^kocchaphaluupajiivii^eb^ti koccha~nca phala~nca upanissaaya jiivanako. tattha koccha.m naama aa.lakaadisa.n.thaapanattha.m kesaadiina.m ullikhanasaadhana.m. ^b^pesiyo^eb^ pesanakaarako veyyaavaccakaro.
[21] ``jaanaamase ya.m tva.m pavadesi yakkha, na kho na.m jaanaama sa edisoti.
[22] mayampi na.m puujayissaama yakkha, sutvaana tuyha.m vacana.m u.laara''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^jaanaamase^eb^ti ya.m tva.m vadesi, ta.m maya.m saruupato jaanaama. ^b^ediso^eb^ti gu.nato pana yathaa tayaa kittita.m, eva.m edisoti ta.m na kho jaanaama, yathaa ta.m aviddasunoti adhippaayo.
[03] idaani devaputto te attano vimaana.m aaropetvaa anusaasanattha.m --
[21] ``ye keci imasmi.m satthe manussaa, daharaa mahantaa athavaapi majjhimaa.
[22] sabbeva ^a^P0.0350^ea^ te aalambantu vimaana.m, passantu pu~n~naana.m phala.m kadariyaa''ti.. --
[25] gaathamaaha ^a^M0.0329^ea^. tattha ^b^mahantaa^eb^ti vu.d.dhaa. ^b^aalambantuu^eb^ti aarohantu. ^b^kadariyaa^eb^ti maccharino adaanasiilaa.
[03] idaani pariyosaane cha gaathaa dhammasa"ngaahakehi vuttaa --
[21] ``te ^a^V0.0297^ea^ tattha sabbeva aha.m pureti, ta.m kappaka.m tattha purakkhatvaa.
[22] sabbeva te aalambi.msu vimaana.m, masakkasaara.m viya vaasavassa..
[21] ``te tattha sabbeva aha.m pureti, upaasakatta.m pa.tivedayi.msu.
[27] paa.naatipaataa virataa ahesu.m, loke adinna.m parivajjayi.msu.
[22] amajjapaa no ca musaa bha.ni.msu, sakena daarena ca ahesu.m tu.t.thaa..
[21] ``te tattha sabbeva aha.m pureti, upaasakatta.m pa.tivedayitvaa.
[22] pakkaami sattho anumodamaano, yakkhiddhiyaa anumato punappuna.m..
[21] ``gantvaana te sa"nghara.m sotthivanto, puttehi daarehi sama"ngibhuutaa.
[27] aanandii vittaa sumanaa patiitaa, aka.msu seriisamaha.m u.laara.m.
[22] ekassa atthaaya upaasakassa, sabbeva sattaa sukhitaa ahesu''nti..

[03] 1276^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^aha.m pure^eb^ti aha.m purima.m aha.m purimanti ahamaha.mkaraati attho. ^b^``te tattha sabbevaa''^eb^ti vatvaa puna ^b^``sabbeva te''^eb^ti vacana.m ``sabbeva te yathaa vimaanassa aaruhane ussukkajaataa ahesu.m, tathaa sabbeva ta.m aaruhi.msu, na kassaci aaruhane antaraayo ahosii''ti dassanattha.m vutta.m. ^b^masakkasaara.m viya vaasavassaa^eb^ti ``masakkasaara''nti ca taavati.msabhavana.m vuccati, sabba.m vaa devabhavana.m, idha pana sakkabhavana.m veditabba.m. tenaaha ``masakkasaara.m viya vaasavassaa''ti.

[03] 1277-8^b^.^eb^ atha te vaa.nijaa vimaana.m passitvaa pasannacittaa tassa devaputtassa ovaade .thatvaa sara.nesu ca siilesu ca pati.t.thaaya tassa aanubhaavena sotthinaa icchita.m desa.m agama.msu. tena vutta.m ^b^``te tattha sabbevaa''^eb^tiaadi. tattha anumato pakkaami sattho yakkhiddhiyaa punappuna.m anumodamaanoti yojanaa. kena pana anumatoti? yakkhenaati paaka.toyamattho.

[03] 1279^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathaapayogaa^eb^ti yathaaajjhaasaya.m katapayogaa. ^b^paripu.n.nalaabhaa^eb^ti samiddhalaabhaa. ^b^akkhata^eb^nti ^a^V0.0298^ea^ anupadduta.m paa.taliputta.m. ^b^akkhata^eb^nti vaa anaabaadha.m anuppii.la.m, anantaraayenaati attho.

[03] 1280^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa"nghara^eb^nti saka.m geha.m. ^b^sotthivanto^eb^ti sotthibhaavena yuttaa khemino. ^b^aanandii^eb^tiaadiihi catuuhi padehi somanassitabhaavameva vadati. ^b^seriisaka.m te parive.na.m maapayi.msuu^eb^ti kata~n~nutaaya .thatvaa pa.tissavamocanattha~nca devaputtassa naamena seriisaka.m naama paricchedavasena ve.niyato pekkhitabbato parive.na.m paasaadakuu.taagaararatti.t.thaanaadisampanna.m ^a^P0.0352^ea^ paakaaraparikkhitta.m dvaarako.t.thakayutta.m aavaasa.m aka.msu.

[03] 1281^b^.^eb^ ^b^etaadisaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0331^ea^ edisii, eva.m anatthapa.tibaahinii atthasaadhikaa ca. ^b^mahatthikaa^eb^ti mahaapayojanaa mahaanisa.msaa. ^b^dhammagu.naana^eb^nti avipariitagu.naana.m. ^b^ekassa^eb^ sattassa hitattha.m ^b^sabbeva sattaa^eb^ sabbe eva te satthapariyaapannaa sattaa, ^b^sukhitaa^eb^ sukhappattaa khemappattaa ^b^ahesu.m^eb^.

[03] sambhavo pana upaasako paayaasissa devaputtassa tesa~nca vaa.nijaana.m vacanapa.tivacanavasena pavatta.m gaathaabandha.m sutaniyaameneva uggahetvaa theraana.m aarocesi. paayaasidevaputto aayasmato sambhavattherassa kathesiiti apare. ta.m yasattherappamukhaa mahaatheraa dutiyasa"ngiitiya.m sa"ngaha.m aaropesu.m. sambhavo pana upaasako maataapituuna.m accayena pabbajitvaa arahatte pati.t.thaasi.

[03] ^b^uccamida.m ma.nithuu.na.m vimaana^eb^nti sunikkhittavimaana.m. tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane. tena samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva devacaarika.m caranto taavati.msabhavana.m upagato. tasmi~nca kha.ne a~n~nataro devaputto attano vimaanadvaare .thito aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m disvaa sa~njaatagaaravabahumaano upasa"nkamitvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi.

[03] so kira atiite kassapasammaasambuddhe parinibbute tassa sariiradhaatuyo pakkhipitvaa yojanike kanakathuupe ca kate catasso parisaa kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa gandhapupphadhuupaadiihi cetiye ^a^V0.0299^ea^ puuja.m karonti, tattha a~n~nataro upaasako a~n~nesu pupphapuuja.m katvaa gatesu tehi puujita.t.thaane dunnikkhittaani pupphaani disvaa tattheva taani sammadeva .thapento sannivesavasena dassaniiya.m paasaadika.m ^a^P0.0353^ea^ vibhattivisesayutta.m pupphapuuja.m akaasi. katvaa ca pana eta.m aaramma.na.m ga.nhanto satthu gu.ne anussaritvaa pasannacitto ta.m pu~n~na.m hadaye .thapesi.

[03] so ^a^M0.0332^ea^ aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa tasseva kammassa aanubhaavena taavati.msabhavane dvaadasayojanike kanakavimaane nibbatti, mahaanubhaavo mahaa cassa parivaaro ahosi. ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``tasmi~nca kha.ne a~n~nataro devaputto...pe0... a.t.thaasii''ti. atha na.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yathaaladdhasampattikittanamukhena katasucaritakamma.m imaahi gaathaahi pucchi --
[22] kuu.taagaaraa sattasataa u.laaraa, ve.luriyathambhaa rucakatthataa subhaa..
[21] ``tatthacchasi pivasi khaadasi ca, dibbaa ca vii.naa pavadanti vaggu.m.
[22] dibbaa rasaa kaamagu.nettha pa~nca, naariyo ca naccanti suva.n.nachannaa..
[21] ``kena tetaadiso va.n.no, kena te idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca te bhogaa, ye keci manaso piyaa..
[21] ``pucchaami ta.m deva mahaanubhaava, manussabhuuto kimakaasi pu~n~na.m.
[22] kenaasi eva.m jalitaanubhaavo, va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti..
[03] sopi tassa attano katakamma.m imaahi gaathaahi kathesi. ta.m dassentaa sa"ngiitikaaraa aaha.msu --
[22] pa~nha.m pu.t.tho viyaakaasi, yassa kammassida.m phala.m''..
[22] mahiddhiko camhi mahaanubhaavo, dibbehi kaamehi sama"ngibhuuto..
[21] ``tena ^a^M0.0333^ea^ ^a^P0.0354^ea^ metaadiso va.n.no, tena me idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca me bhogaa, ye keci manaso piyaa..
[21] ``akkhaami te bhikkhu mahaanubhaava, manussabhuuto yamaha.m akaasi.m.
[22] tenamhi eva.m jalitaanubhaavo, va.n.no ca me sabbadisaa pabhaasatii''ti..

[03] 1287^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^dunnikkhitta.m maala^eb^nti cetiye puujaakara.na.t.thaane nirantara.t.thapanaadinaa racanaavisesena a.t.thapetvaa yathaanikkhittataaya na su.t.thu nikkhitta.m, vaatena vaa paharitvaa dunnikkhitta.m puppha.m. ^b^sunikkhipitvaa^eb^ti su.t.thu nikkhipitvaa racanaavisesena dassaniiya.m paasaadika.m katvaa nikkhipiya. ^b^pati.t.thapetvaa^eb^ti vibhattivisesaadivasena puppha.m pati.t.thaapetvaa. ta.m vaa puppha.m nikkhipanto satthu cetiya.m uddissa mama santaane kusaladhamma.m pati.t.thaapetvaati eva.m ettha attho da.t.thabbo. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] eva.m devaputtena attano sucaritakamme pakaasite thero tassa dhamma.m desetvaa aagantvaa bhagavato tamattha.m nivedesi. bhagavaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa sampattamahaajanassa dhamma.m desesi. desanaa mahaajanassa saatthikaa ahosiiti.
[21] yaa ^a^P0.0355^ea^ tattha paramatthaana.m, tattha tattha yathaaraha.m.
[21] iti ta.m sa"nkharontena, ya.m ta.m adhigata.m mayaa.
[22] tasmi.m sagaaravaa nicca.m, hontu sabbepi paa.nino..
